title: WazirX Hack News: FIU Launches Probe Into Exchange’s Security Failures
body: The post WazirX Hack News: FIU Launches Probe Into Exchange’s Security Failures appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News After nearly 7 months, WazirX, one of India’s largest cryptocurrency exchanges, is under intense scrutiny as the Financial Intelligence Unit (FIU) has been ordered to investigate the platform for fraud and security failures. This directive, issued by India’s Ministry of Finance on February 14, 2025, comes months after WazirX suffered a massive ₹2000 crore hack, putting over ₹4500 crore in user funds at risk. Breaking NEWS : India’s Finance Ministry Orders FIU Investigation into WazirX for Fraud! pic.twitter.com/ZUIBAUEVII — Pushpendra Singh (@pushpendrakum) March 7, 2025 Government Cracks Down on Crypto Irregularities The investigation follows a formal complaint filed with the Finance Ministry, prompting Shri Kailash Chand Joshi, Under Secretary (Legal), to escalate the matter. Official documents now task the FIU with uncovering the full extent of WazirX’s alleged fraudulent activities. This move signals stricter enforcement in India’s crypto sector as regulators aim to clamp down on financial misconduct and safeguard investor interests. The hack resulted in significant losses for investors, and nearly 43% of users are likely to lose their funds, with investigations revealing complex hacking techniques and possible internal vulnerabilities. WazirX has been cooperating with authorities but has not yet provided a clear resolution for affected users. Money Laundering Allegations and Binance Connection However, authorities have raised serious concerns over WazirX’s compliance failures. Reports suggest the platform may have facilitated money laundering for fintech firms by failing to enforce proper KYC (Know Your Customer) checks and neglecting to maintain bank account records. The Enforcement Directorate (ED) previously criticized WazirX for weak transaction controls, particularly in dealings with Binance. Adding to its troubles, the exchange’s massive security breach in July 2024—linked to North Korea’s Lazarus Group—exposed significant flaws in its operational safeguards. Investigations revealed discrepancies in transaction data and inadequate wallet security, further raising doubts about the platform’s integrity. Will WazirX Executives Face Legal Consequences? With mounting evidence, speculation is growing that WazirX co-founder Nischal Shetty and key associates could face criminal charges. If the FIU’s probe confirms financial misconduct, severe legal repercussions, including potential jail time, could follow. This case is poised to become a landmark moment in India’s crypto regulation. If wrongdoing is proved, it could lead to stricter rules, tighter oversight, and heightened accountability for exchanges operating in the country. The industry is now watching closely, as the FIU’s findings could reshape the regulations scene for digital assets in India.

title: Bitcoin Price Flirts With $90K in a Historic Week for Crypto Markets: Your Weekly Recap
body: US President Donald J. Trump made good on one of his pro-crypto promises and signed an executive order that will make it mandatory for the country to at least maintain its BTC stash. Yet, bitcoin prices are yet to feel the actual impact. But before going into details on that order signed on Thursday, let’s go back to the developments that unfolded during the weekend. After a calm few days following BTC’s latest rollercoaster, the asset had remained at around $85,000 before, on Sunday evening, Trump posted on his social media that there are indeed plans to establish a US-based crypto reserve that will hold some altcoins and bitcoin. Prices exploded within minutes. BTC skyrocketed from its aforementioned level by ten grand and tapped a multi-day peak of $95,000. However, that turned out to be a fakeout as some analysts warned and the cryptocurrency dumped by $13,000 in the next 36 hours to under $82,000 on Tuesday. Its correction didn’t continue in the following days. Just the opposite, bitcoin started to recover some ground and knocked on the $90,000 door on a couple of occasions but to no avail. The first rejection came on Thursday, but the second big one on Friday morning pushed BTC south hard to $85,000 once again. Interestingly, this one came just minutes after Trump signed the executive order to halt the sales of bitcoin from the US government, which owns close to 190,000 BTC (valued at over $17 billion). This classic sell-the-news event sent bitcoin south, but the asset jumped to $91,000 just a few hours ago. However, another rejection arrived at this point, and BTC now struggles beneath $90,000. The day is far from over, though, given the upcoming crypto summit to be held at the White House. Consequently, more volatility is expected. The weekly landscape is quite positive for BTC and many altcoins, but that’s mostly because the entire market plummeted last Friday once again. On a monthly scale, the situation is different, with most assets deep in the red. Market Data Weekly Market Overview: Source: QuantifyCrypto Market Cap: $3T | 24H Vol: $150B | BTC Dominance: 58.3% BTC: $88,090 (+7.4%) | ETH: $2,194 (+1.1%) | XRP: $2.49 (+18.4%) This Week’s Crypto Headlines You Can’t Miss Ethereum Sentiment Hits Yearly Lows: Is This the Ultimate Contrarian Play? The second-largest cryptocurrency continues to underperform and was close to breaking below $2,000 earlier this week. Naturally, the sentiment toward ETH has gone south hard, but could this actually be a blessing in disguise ? Declining Dollar Index Could be a Tailwind For Crypto: Analysts . The greenback has lost a big portion of its value compared to other currencies. Moreover, analysts claim that Trump plans to devalue it further. Interestingly, a weak dollar could mean higher prices for bitcoin and altcoins, and here’s why . Bukele Defies IMF, Reaffirms Bitcoin Commitment Despite Loan Restrictions . El Salvadoran president Nayib Bukele got a loan deal from the IMF several months ago, and parts of that agreement mandated that the country reduce its Bitcoin involvement. However, Bukele refused to stop the BTC investments and outlined a bullish perspective earlier this week. XRP, SOL, and ADA Inclusion in US Crypto Reserve Pushes Traders on Edge . As mentioned above, Trump named several altcoins that could potentially be included in the US strategic crypto reserve. Expectedly, their prices soared by double-digits immediately after the Sunday post, which led to a large number of liquidated traders on both sides, given the fact that these alts retraced hard just a day later. Why Arthur Hayes Is Bullish on Bitcoin Under Trump’s Economic Strategy . The BitMEX co-founder has been a vocal critic of the Bitcoin reserve in the States. He believes it will ultimately serve the purpose of whoever is in charge, disregarding the entire crypto market. In a more recent post, though, Hayes stated that the Trump administration’s actions will be bullish for BTC. Bybit Hacker Reportedly Launders Entire $1.4B Loot in Just 10 Days . The Bybit hacker, largely believed to be the North Korea-backed Lazarus Group, needed less than two weeks to launder the entire stolen amount, which was worth around $1.4 billion at the time of the incident. Charts This week, we have a chart analysis of Ethereum, Ripple, Cardano, Binance Coin, and Solana – click here for the complete price analysis . The post Bitcoin Price Flirts With $90K in a Historic Week for Crypto Markets: Your Weekly Recap appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: What’s Happening in Crypto Today? Daily Crypto News Digest
body: In crypto news today: Crypto market is red today PancakeSwap Sees Highest Monthly Trading Volumes Since 2021 Public Miners Pour $5B into Bitcoin Supply Chain – Miner Weekly MEXC Partners with Hacken to Boost Platform Security __________ Crypto market is red today The crypto market continues its red streak. The global cryptocurrency market capitalization fell 3.8% over the past 24 hours, currently standing at $3.03 trillion. At the time of writing, the daily crypto trading volume is $149 billion. About 20 of the top 100 coins per market cap are green today. The best performer in this category is Sui (SUI) , which increased by 5.2% to $2.82. On the other hand, Cronos (CRO) fell the most: 12% to $0.08593. Two more coins saw double-digit drops in this category. As for the top 10 coins, only one is green today. TRON (TRX) increased by 1% to the price of $0.2429. The rest are down between Binance Coin (BNB)’s 0.4% and Cardano (ADA)’s 7%. The two are currently trading at $599 and $0.8733, respectively. At the same time, Bitcoin (BTC) decreased by 1.8%, trading at $89,030, while Ethereum (ETH) fell 3.9%, currently changing hands at $2,190. PancakeSwap Sees Highest Monthly Trading Volumes Since 2021 Major decentralized exchange (DEX) PancakeSwap announced that it set new records in trading activity in January and February 2025. Per the press release shared with Cryptonews , it saw new all-time-highs in monthly trading volumes since 2021. January saw a monthly trading volume of $81.9 billion across all chains, while February recorded $78.7 billion across all chains. Source: PancakeSwap, DeFiLlama Additionally, the platform surpassed $1 trillion in cumulative trading volume on 13 February. This is “a historic milestone that underscores its sustained growth,” the team said. It added that the “figures represent a major resurgence for PancakeSwap, reflecting increasing user activity, growing liquidity, and the continued expansion of its multichain ecosystem.” Meanwhile, two key factors contributed to PancakeSwap’s growth. The first is its multichain expansion, as PancakeSwap is now deployed across nine blockchains ( BNB Chain , Ethereum , Aptos , Polygon zkEVM , zkSync Era , Arbitrum , Linea , Base , and opBNB ). The other factor is the BNB Chain ecosystem growth, given that PancakeSwap benefits from BNB Chain’s “increasing resurgence,” the team said. You might also like PancakeSwap Reveals No-Code Token Launchpad Platform ‘SpringBoard’ Public Miners Pour $5B into Bitcoin Supply Chain – Miner Weekly The cash flow statements of ten major US-listed mining companies for 2024 show a total spending of $4.6 billion on general property, plant, and equipment, according to the latest Miner Weekly report by BlocksBridge Consulting . These companies include Bitdeer , Cipher , CleanSpark , Core Scientific , HIVE , Hut 8 , IREN , MARA , Riot , and Terawulf . Per the data tracked by TheMinerMag , with several other companies that have disclosed earnings until September, the total spending is up to $4.95 billion. “This represents a fourfold increase compared to the $1.2 billion spent in 2023, following the bear market of 2022,” the report noted. Source: Miner Weekly Furthermore, in 2024, the ten major mining companies liquidated about $100 million worth of older-generation miners. Almost all of the trading activity happened in Q4. Notably, mining institutions are gradually phasing out older models as they’re facing difficulty generating profits. According to the report, “the total spending on and trading of mining-related property, plant, and equipment offers insight into how much bitcoin mining is supporting a broader supply chain network in the US and globally.” It cited a report by the economic research firm Perryman Group , commissioned by the Texas Blockchain Council and the Digital Chamber of Commerce , which estimates that Bitcoin mining created over 31,000 jobs and generated more than $4.1 billion in gross product annually for the US economy. You might also like US Authorities Release ‘Thousands’ of Seized Chinese Crypto Mining Machines: Report MEXC Partners with Hacken to Boost Platform Security Crypto trading platform MEXC announced a strategic partnership with the blockchain security auditor Hacken to further increase the platform’s security. According to the press release, Hacken will conduct a comprehensive security assessment to ensure that MEXC’s infrastructure is protected from vulnerabilities and cyber threats. The assessment will focus on several critical areas. These include identifying and addressing vulnerabilities across web applications, mobile apps, and application programming interface (APIs). Furthermore, it encompasses assessing encryption measures to prevent data leakage, safeguarding session management to prevent hijacking and fixation attacks, and verifying that user inputs are sanitized to prevent injection attacks. Exciting news! #MEXC is partnering with @hackenclub to boost platform security! With #Hacken ’s expertise, we’re enhancing asset protection, ensuring a safer trading experience for all. Stay SAFU! Learn more: https://t.co/2o3FnQFjSM pic.twitter.com/9TEjbZabYT — MEXC (@MEXC_Official) March 5, 2025 Dyma Budorin, CEO of Hacken, commented that “in an industry built on trust, proactive security is essential for long-term success and user confidence.” MEXC CEOO Tracy Jin added that the implemented security measures will evolve alongside emerging threats so that MEXC can respond to market opportunities and stay “resilient against sophisticated security challenges.” You might also like Hacken’s Community-Driven DeFi Security Flash Pool Sells Out in 11 Minutes __________ Bookmark this page and subscribe to our newsletter for the latest crypto news updates! The post What’s Happening in Crypto Today? Daily Crypto News Digest appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Revolutionary Partnership: Pundi AI & Twin3 AI Unveil New Era of Digital Identity in Crypto
body: In the ever-evolving landscape of cryptocurrency and Web3, the need for secure and reliable digital identity solutions is paramount. Imagine a world where your online identity is not only verified but also empowers you within the decentralized ecosystem. That future is edging closer as Pundi AI , a leading decentralized AI data annotation platform, has just announced a groundbreaking partnership with Twin3 AI , a pioneering digital identity management project. This collaboration is set to redefine how we perceive and utilize digital identity in the age of artificial intelligence. Why Digital Identity is the Cornerstone of Web3’s Future Before diving into the specifics of this exciting partnership, let’s understand why digital identity is such a hot topic and a critical component for the future of Web3. In the traditional web, our identities are often siloed and controlled by centralized entities. Web3, with its promise of decentralization and user empowerment, demands a different approach. Here’s why digital identity is crucial: Security and Trust: In a decentralized world, establishing trust is essential. Digital identities provide a secure and verifiable way to confirm users are who they claim to be, reducing fraud and enhancing security. Seamless User Experience: Imagine accessing various decentralized applications (dApps) without repeatedly going through cumbersome KYC (Know Your Customer) processes. Digital identities can streamline user onboarding and create a more fluid experience across different platforms. Data Ownership and Control: Web3 is about giving users control over their data. Digital identity solutions can empower individuals to manage their personal information and decide who has access to it. Compliance and Regulation: As the crypto space matures, regulatory compliance becomes increasingly important. Digital identities can facilitate adherence to KYC/AML (Anti-Money Laundering) regulations in a decentralized manner. In essence, digital identity acts as the bedrock upon which a secure, user-friendly, and compliant Web3 ecosystem can be built. Now, let’s explore how Pundi AI and Twin3 AI are joining forces to make this vision a reality. Pundi AI and Twin3 AI: A Synergistic Alliance for AI Authentication The partnership between Pundi AI and Twin3 AI is more than just a collaboration; it’s a strategic alignment of two innovative forces in the decentralized space. Pundi AI brings to the table its expertise in decentralized AI data annotation , creating high-quality datasets crucial for training robust AI models. Twin3 AI, on the other hand, specializes in digital identity management, leveraging blockchain technology to create secure and user-centric identity solutions. This partnership is laser-focused on two primary objectives: Strengthening AI-based Identity Authentication: By combining Pundi AI’s advanced AI capabilities with Twin3 AI’s secure digital identities, the collaboration aims to significantly enhance the accuracy and reliability of AI authentication processes. Establishing a Trusted Data Environment: Verified digital identities from Twin3 AI will be used to create a more trustworthy and secure environment for data annotation and AI model training within the Pundi AI ecosystem. Think of it as building a house (AI model) on a solid foundation (verified digital identities). The strength of the house depends on the quality of the foundation, and this partnership is all about ensuring that the foundation for AI in the Web3 space is as robust as possible. Revolutionizing AI Authentication with Decentralized Technology At the heart of this partnership lies the ambition to revolutionize AI authentication . Traditional authentication methods often rely on centralized databases and are vulnerable to breaches and single points of failure. Decentralized AI authentication , powered by blockchain and verifiable digital identities, offers a more secure and resilient alternative. Here’s how Pundi AI and Twin3 AI are planning to enhance AI authentication : Leveraging Verified Digital Identities: Twin3 AI’s digital ID framework will provide a layer of verification to user identities within the Pundi AI platform. This means that AI models trained using data annotated on Pundi AI will be trained on data contributed by verified individuals, increasing the trustworthiness of the data. Enhancing Accuracy and Reliability: By using verified identities, the partnership aims to reduce the risk of malicious actors or bots manipulating data annotation processes. This leads to more accurate and reliable AI models, especially in identity-sensitive applications. Creating a Privacy-Preserving Ecosystem: Decentralized AI authentication can be designed to be privacy-preserving. Users retain control over their identity data, and verification can be done in a way that minimizes data exposure. Imagine a future where accessing decentralized services or participating in on-chain governance is as simple as a secure and privacy-preserving AI authentication process, all thanks to the synergy of Pundi AI and Twin3 AI. The Power of AI Data Annotation in a Trusted Environment Pundi AI’s core offering is its decentralized AI data annotation platform. Data annotation is the process of labeling data (images, text, audio, etc.) so that AI models can learn from it. High-quality annotated data is the fuel that powers effective AI models. However, the quality of data annotation is only as good as the trustworthiness of the annotators and the data environment. This is where Twin3 AI’s digital identity solution becomes invaluable. By integrating verified digital identities, Pundi AI can create a more trusted environment for AI data annotation . This has several key benefits: Benefit Description Improved Data Quality Verified identities reduce the likelihood of spam, bot activity, and malicious annotations, leading to higher quality datasets for AI training. Increased Trust in AI Models AI models trained on data annotated in a trusted environment are more likely to be reliable and accurate, especially in critical applications. Enhanced Platform Security Digital identities contribute to a more secure platform overall, protecting both annotators and data consumers from potential threats. Compliance and Traceability Verified identities can aid in compliance efforts and provide better traceability of data provenance, which is crucial for responsible AI development. By creating a virtuous cycle of trust and quality, Pundi AI and Twin3 AI are setting a new standard for AI data annotation in the decentralized world. AI MM Agent and the Future of Intelligent Agents Adding another layer of innovation to this partnership, Pundi AI plans to integrate its next-generation AI training model, the AI MM Agent , with Twin3’s digital identity framework. The AI MM Agent is designed to be a more advanced and versatile AI model, capable of handling complex tasks and interactions. Integrating it with verified digital identities opens up exciting possibilities for the future of AI agents. Here’s what this integration could mean: Reliable and Trustworthy AI Agents: By grounding AI agents in verified digital identities, their reliability and trustworthiness can be significantly enhanced. This is crucial for applications where agents interact with sensitive data or perform critical actions. Personalized and Secure AI Services: Imagine AI agents that can provide personalized services based on your verified digital identity, ensuring both customization and security. Advancing Decentralized AI Ecosystems: This integration contributes to the development of more sophisticated and trustworthy decentralized AI ecosystems, paving the way for a wider adoption of AI in Web3. The integration of AI MM Agent with Twin3 AI’s digital identity framework is a forward-looking step, hinting at a future where AI agents are not just intelligent but also deeply integrated with our verified digital lives. Benefits of the Pundi AI and Twin3 AI Partnership: A Win-Win Scenario This partnership is poised to deliver significant benefits across the board, impacting various stakeholders in the Web3 and AI space: For Users: Enhanced security, streamlined user experience across dApps, greater control over their digital identities, and access to more reliable and trustworthy AI services. For Developers: Access to higher quality data for training AI models, a more secure and robust platform for building decentralized applications, and the ability to leverage advanced AI authentication and digital identity solutions. For the Crypto Ecosystem: A step forward in building a more mature, secure, and user-friendly Web3, fostering greater adoption and trust in decentralized technologies. In essence, the Pundi AI and Twin3 AI partnership is a win-win scenario, accelerating the development of both decentralized AI and digital identity solutions, and contributing to a more robust and trustworthy Web3 ecosystem. Challenges and the Path Forward While the potential of this partnership is immense, it’s also important to acknowledge potential challenges and the road ahead: Adoption and Integration: Widespread adoption of decentralized digital identity solutions and their seamless integration into existing Web3 platforms will be crucial for realizing the full benefits of this partnership. Scalability and Performance: Ensuring that AI authentication and digital identity solutions are scalable and performant enough to handle the demands of a growing Web3 ecosystem is essential. User Education and Awareness: Educating users about the benefits of decentralized digital identity and AI authentication will be key to driving adoption and overcoming potential user skepticism. Overcoming these challenges will require continued innovation, collaboration, and a focus on user-centric design. However, the partnership between Pundi AI and Twin3 AI represents a significant leap in the right direction. Conclusion: Ushering in a New Era of Trust in Decentralized AI The collaboration between Pundi AI and Twin3 AI is more than just a partnership announcement; it’s a powerful signal of the direction in which the Web3 space is heading. By combining decentralized AI data annotation with robust digital identity solutions, these two companies are paving the way for a future where AI is not only intelligent but also trustworthy, secure, and deeply integrated with our digital lives. This revolutionary partnership holds the promise of unlocking new levels of security, efficiency, and user empowerment within the cryptocurrency and Web3 ecosystem. As we move forward, the integration of decentralized AI and digital identity will undoubtedly play a pivotal role in shaping the future of the internet and how we interact with it. To learn more about the latest digital identity trends, explore our article on key developments shaping digital identity institutional adoption.

title: BTC Staking Platform Core Seeks Further Institutional Reach With APAC Custodian Cobo
body: Bitcoin ( BTC ) staking layer Core has teamed up with Singapore-based custodian Cobo to expand its institutional reach into the Asia-Pacific (APAC) region. Core, issuer of the liquid-staking token lstBTC, will enable Cobo's institutional clients to earn a return on BTC holdings while maintaining full control over their assets, according to an emailed announcement shared with CoinDesk on Friday. Numerous projects are now offering BTC holders a means of earning yield, potentially unlocking untold liquidity into the decentralized finance (DeFi) industry. They also provide alternative revenue sources to miners, which can help to offset declining Bitcoin block subsidies. Core's staking protocol has secured over 6,200 BTC ($548 million) with its blockchain secured by around 76% of Bitcoin's hashrate, according to Friday's announcement. “Our integration with Cobo greatly enhances the Core ecosystem by onboarding liquidity from high-caliber institutional clients,” said Brendon Sedo, initial contributor at Core. Last month, Core partnered with Maple Finance and custodians BitGo, Copper and Hex Trust in another move that promised to broaden access to BTC staking for institutions.

title: Crypto projects raised $1.1B in February
body: This is a segment from the Empire newsletter. To read full editions, subscribe . To end the first week of March, let’s look back at venture capital activity in February, shall we? Perhaps we can sum it up to a shorter month, but overall venture capital funding in February was down slightly from January, though the number of companies raising was up marginally. Last month, $1.11 billion was raised by 137 companies, though we saw $1.57 billion go to 132 companies to kick the year off, per TIE Terminal data. DeFi paved the way last month, with 20 companies raising around $175 million. Perhaps that’s a sign of a trend of where money’s going, because DeFi also led deals in January, with 21 companies raising $339 million. But it’s not just DeFi receiving the attention. There were notable raises from a couple of other firms, including Bitwise, which raised $70 million through an equity raise in a round led by Electric Capital. And Raise, the gift card company looking to use its $63 million round to beef up its blockchain-based gift card offerings. I don’t choose favorites when it comes to VC rounds, but this one certainly caught my eye when it was announced late last month. When comparing the raises (not just the gift card company) to January, the rounds are smaller. Phantom and Movement Labs both had rounds of $150 million and $100 million , respectively. Source: The TIE Terminal When looking at the deal sizes so far this year, there is a noticeable drop. I’m cautious to read too much into it yet, given the overall bullish environment and the fact that I’ve had plenty of conversations with VCs in which they affirm that they’re pretty active, but this is the trend we’re currently looking at. Source: TIE As you can see, the number of larger deals seems to have peaked in December of last year, though we’re still seeing deals above $50 million — take Raise and Bitwise, for example. The average deal size, if we’re looking this week, sits at $9 million. On the last day of February, it was slightly higher at $10 million. We’re only two months into the year, so I’m cautious to call any of this data a trend yet, and we’re still a ways off from the peak of crypto VC activity, which topped $23 billion in 2022 . But consider my interest piqued, especially because PitchBook’s Robert Le told us last year that he expected more of a bull market in 2025. Bring it on. Get the news in your inbox. title: Fold buys 475 Bitcoin, enters top 10 of US companies holding BTC
body: Fold Holdings has added 475 Bitcoin to its corporate treasury, increasing its total holdings to over 1,485 BTC. The acquisition, made through a convertible note issuance with a conversion price of $12.50 per share — more than double FLD’s March 5 closing price — places Fold among the top 10 U.S. public companies with the largest Bitcoin ( BTC ) treasuries. This means that Fold’s Bitcoin holdings are currently worth over $135 million. You might also like: RED trading volume hikes 2000% as sell pressure mounts after airdrop criteria expansion Powering the ‘next generation’ of financial services The company’s flagship product, the Fold app, allows users to earn Bitcoin rewards on everyday purchases through its debit and credit card offerings. This approach has resonated with consumers looking to accumulate Bitcoin as part of their regular spending habits. “As the first publicly traded bitcoin financial services company, we believe maintaining a significant bitcoin treasury not only drives value for our shareholders but also strengthens our ability to power the next generation of financial services built on bitcoin,” said Fold CEO Will Reeves. Fold officially went public on the Nasdaq under the ticker “FLD” in February, increasing its visibility and allowing investors to engage with its bitcoin-focused vision. Nasdaq plans to introduce 24/5 trading, allowing investors to trade stocks continuously from Sunday evening to Friday night. At the time of writing, Fold’s stock is trading at $8.18 per share. You might also like: Secretary Bessent calls for US Bitcoin and crypto dominance ahead of Trump’s summit

The platform maintains a distribution and buying system that utilizes part of its earnings to purchase MUTM tokens on the market and redistribute them to mtToken stakeholders. The distributed tokens supplied to mtToken stakers establish continuous purchasing demand that stimulates investors to maintain a long-time holding strategy. As a result this system enables both short-term traders and long-term investors to find MUTM attractive because it combines stable prices with continuous growth potential. A Competitive Edge in the Crypto Market The cryptocurrency market leader Solana (SOL) competes with Mutuum Finance (MUTM) because MUTM specialized in decentralized lending and borrowing solutions. Solana achieves popularity with developers because of its fast processing framework while MUTM positions itself differently through real-world financial integration and its built-in token economy structure. title: Trump potentially dials back Elon Musk’s DOGE authority, clarifies that Cabinet should make staffing decisions
body: According to a report from NBC, President Donald Trump informed his Cabinet secretaries during a meeting on Thursday that they will have the final say on staffing decisions, not Elon Musk and his Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE). Trump reportedly instructed Cabinet members and DOGE to team up and work on spending and workforce reductions. However, he clarified that final job cuts will happen at the discretion of the department leaders. President Trump’s new mandate regarding DOGE “We just had a meeting with most of the Secretaries, Elon, and others, and it was a very positive one,” Trump shared on Truth Social. “It’s very important that we cut levels down to where they should be, but it’s also important to keep the best and most productive people.” President Donald Trump’s Truth Social post explaining how Elon Musk’s DOGE and Cabinet members can work together to manage federal government costs. Source: Donald Trump (Truth Social) Trump implied that secretaries will genuinely work to understand people working in various departments and will use their knowledge to decide who goes and who stays. “We say the ‘scalpel’ rather than the ‘hatchet,'” Trump said. The message is the first time Trump has publicly put a leash on Musk’s authority as he continues to help reshape the federal government. Some even see it as early signs of dissent between DOGE and the Cabinet members. Several members of the Cabinet were unhappy with Musk’s recent order, which asked federal employees to outline their achievements for the week or face termination, with multiple agencies and departments initially resisting the effort. While the new message implies some excesses on Musk’s end, Trump also praised him and DOGE after Thursday’s meeting for what they have gotten done so far. “I think they’ve done an amazing job,” the president told reporters. Musk also tagged the meeting a “very productive” one in a post on X. It marks his second time attending a Trump Cabinet meeting. At the first cabinet meeting he attended last month, Musk called DOGE a “support function” to help the federal agencies “find a 15% reduction in fraud and waste.” In recent weeks, DOGE has faced significant backlash, especially from federal workers, unions, and progressive groups, people who have been affected by its actions. All the confusion has been building up to a chaotic conclusion, which is probably why the president has decided to step in with a leash for the agency. Musk still has a huge role to play According to Trump’s comments to reporters in the Oval Office on Thursday, his directive to his Cabinet members was to “Keep all the people you want, all the people that you need.” It was most likely a move to appease his aggrieved Cabinet members, who have increasingly been clashing with DOGE over several interests, most especially employment. The order reduces Musk’s power, but he can still do a lot. Trump has indicated that Musk will step in if the department heads fail to make sufficient cuts. “If they can cut, it’s better. If they don’t cut, then Elon will do the cutting,” Trump said. Trump and Musk have been trying to drastically reduce the size of the federal workforce, which has led to the dismissal of thousands of employees and the shuttering of entire agencies. Senate DOGE Caucus pose for a photo with Elon Musk. Source: Elon Musk (X/Twitter) As earlier stated, the speed and intensity with which the cuts have been happening has not sat well with some Republican members of Congress, and it has sparked calls for greater transparency into DOGE’s work, particularly after some lawmakers faced fierce backlash from people at town halls in their districts. So, on top of the Herculean task of cleaning up government excesses, DOGE has to also pacify crowds the whole way. Musk even had to meet with Senate Republicans for nearly two hours behind closed doors on Wednesday to address their concerns over potential voter backlash to the cuts. The meeting was organized by Sen. Rick Scott after several Republican senators raised concerns with White House Chief of Staff Susie Wiles last month about being kept out of the loop on DOGE’s work. Musk also met with House Republicans on Wednesday, later informing reporters that he spoke about the “opportunity to improve expenditures in the government.” Is DOGE actually working? It depends on who you ask. To date, sentiments regarding the newly created agency are mixed. According to one CBS News/YouGov poll conducted between February 26 and February 28, 2025, only slim majorities support Musk’s involvement and efforts to shrink the federal workforce. Earlier this month, Musk revealed that DOGE has a very high “approval” from people as a whole, a fact he contrasted with the criticism he was getting. These majorities consist mostly of Republicans and fans of Musk and Trump, many of whom see government spending as excessive. DOGE now says it has saved $105 billion so far, and while it has been a challenge to verify this figure, the agency’s supporters still praise it for its work. It has been difficult to verify that DOGE is actually doing what it says it’s doing, and this has added to the backlash. It does not help matters that DOGE’s “wall of receipts” website, which was meant to showcase savings, has been full of errors. Some of these involved the agency claiming credit for canceled contracts that ended years ago or inflating figures. title: Revolutionary Vision: TON Ventures Seeks AI and Crypto Product-Market Fit via Telegram
body: The crypto world is buzzing with innovation, and the latest development is sparking significant interest. Howard Peng, the Tech Director at TON Ventures, has ignited a conversation about the exciting intersection of artificial intelligence (AI) and cryptocurrency. In a recent post on X, Peng revealed his ambition to establish a dedicated research group. This team’s sole mission? To dive deep into the potential of merging AI and crypto technologies and, crucially, to pinpoint the elusive product-market fit (PMF) within the vast Telegram ecosystem. Let’s unpack what this means and why it could be a game-changer. Why the Buzz Around AI and Crypto? The fusion of AI and crypto isn’t just a futuristic fantasy; it’s rapidly becoming a tangible reality with immense potential. But what exactly makes this combination so compelling? Think about it: Enhanced Efficiency and Automation: AI algorithms can automate complex processes within the crypto space, from trading strategies to risk management and even smart contract auditing. Imagine AI-powered tools that can analyze market trends in real-time and execute trades with unparalleled precision. Personalized User Experiences: In the world of cryptocurrency , personalization is becoming increasingly important. AI can analyze user data to deliver tailored investment advice, customized news feeds, and even personalized learning resources about blockchain and digital assets. Improved Security and Fraud Detection: AI’s pattern recognition capabilities are invaluable in identifying and preventing fraudulent activities in the crypto space. From detecting suspicious transactions to enhancing KYC/AML processes, AI can fortify the security infrastructure of blockchain networks. New Product and Service Innovation: The synergy of AI and crypto opens doors to entirely new categories of products and services. Think AI-driven DeFi platforms, intelligent crypto wallets, and AI-powered NFT marketplaces that offer dynamic and personalized experiences. This isn’t just theoretical; we’re already seeing early examples of this convergence. From AI-powered trading bots to platforms utilizing machine learning for fraud detection, the integration is underway. Howard Peng’s initiative at TON Ventures is perfectly timed to capitalize on this burgeoning trend. Telegram: The Ideal Platform for AI and Crypto Integration? Why is Telegram specifically in the spotlight for exploring the product-market fit of AI and crypto ? It’s not just another messaging app; Telegram boasts several unique features that make it an intriguing arena for this technological fusion: Massive User Base: Telegram’s hundreds of millions of active users provide a substantial and diverse audience to test and deploy AI and crypto integrated applications. This scale is crucial for achieving genuine product-market fit . Open API and Bot Ecosystem: Telegram’s robust API and thriving bot ecosystem are key advantages. Developers can easily build and integrate AI-powered bots that interact with users, providing crypto-related services, information, and functionalities directly within the app. TON Blockchain Integration: Telegram’s connection to the TON (The Open Network) blockchain is a significant factor. TON is designed for speed and scalability, making it suitable for handling the demands of both AI computations and cryptocurrency transactions. This synergy within the Telegram ecosystem is a powerful draw. Community and Engagement: Telegram is renowned for its vibrant communities and high levels of user engagement, especially within the crypto space. This active environment is perfect for fostering innovation, gathering user feedback, and iterating on AI and crypto products. Consider the table below which highlights Telegram’s strengths for this purpose: Feature Benefit for AI & Crypto Integration on Telegram Large User Base Vast testing ground and potential market for PMF Open API & Bots Easy development and integration of AI-powered crypto services TON Blockchain Native blockchain integration for seamless crypto transactions Active Communities Rapid feedback, user engagement, and innovation fostering The Quest for Product-Market Fit: What Does it Mean in the AI and Crypto Context? Product-market fit (PMF) is the holy grail for any startup or new technology. In simple terms, it signifies the point where a product or service effectively meets the needs and desires of a significant market segment. For AI and crypto on Telegram, achieving PMF means creating applications that are not only technologically advanced but also genuinely useful and desirable to Telegram’s users, particularly within the cryptocurrency community. Howard Peng and TON Ventures are essentially embarking on a journey to answer crucial questions: What specific problems can AI and crypto solutions solve for Telegram users? What types of AI-powered crypto services are users actively seeking within the Telegram environment? How can these solutions be designed to be user-friendly, accessible, and valuable within the Telegram ecosystem? Finding PMF isn’t a linear process; it requires experimentation, iteration, and a deep understanding of user needs. The research group envisioned by Peng will likely employ methods such as user surveys, beta testing, and data analysis to identify promising areas for development and refine their offerings based on real-world feedback. TON Ventures’ Vision: Leading the Charge in AI-Crypto Innovation TON Ventures , as the investment arm associated with the TON blockchain, is strategically positioned to spearhead this exploration. Their focus on fostering the TON ecosystem makes them a natural incubator for AI and crypto projects built on Telegram. Howard Peng, with his role as Tech Director, brings a wealth of technical expertise and a clear vision for the future of decentralized technologies. By forming this dedicated research group, TON Ventures is signaling a strong commitment to: Driving Innovation: They are actively investing in exploring cutting-edge technologies and pushing the boundaries of what’s possible within the cryptocurrency and AI space. Ecosystem Growth: Successful product-market fit for AI and crypto applications on Telegram will undoubtedly contribute to the growth and vibrancy of the entire TON ecosystem. Real-World Applications: The focus on PMF underscores a practical approach. TON Ventures isn’t just interested in theoretical concepts; they are seeking to build solutions that have tangible real-world utility for users. This initiative could be a catalyst for a wave of innovation, attracting developers and entrepreneurs eager to build the next generation of AI and crypto applications within the Telegram environment. It’s a bold move that could solidify Telegram’s position as a leading platform for crypto innovation. Potential Benefits of AI and Crypto Integration on Telegram Imagine a future where your Telegram experience is seamlessly enhanced by the power of AI and crypto . What could this look like in practice? The potential benefits are vast and exciting: Smart Crypto Trading Bots: AI-powered bots that can analyze market data, execute trades, and manage your portfolio directly within Telegram. Personalized Crypto News and Insights: AI algorithms that curate crypto news and information tailored to your interests and investment portfolio. AI-Assisted DeFi Platforms: Decentralized finance (DeFi) platforms integrated into Telegram, guided by AI to optimize yields and manage risks. Enhanced Security and Fraud Alerts: AI systems that monitor your crypto transactions within Telegram and alert you to potential security threats or suspicious activities. AI-Driven Crypto Education: Interactive AI tutors and learning tools accessible via Telegram bots to help users understand the complexities of cryptocurrency and blockchain technology. Challenges and Considerations Ahead While the potential is immense, the path to achieving product-market fit for AI and crypto on Telegram isn’t without its hurdles. Some key challenges and considerations include: Regulatory Uncertainty: The regulatory landscape for both AI and cryptocurrency is still evolving. Navigating these regulations and ensuring compliance will be crucial. Technical Complexity: Integrating AI and blockchain technologies is inherently complex. Developing robust, scalable, and user-friendly solutions will require significant technical expertise. User Adoption and Education: Convincing mainstream Telegram users to adopt and utilize AI-powered crypto services will require effective education and user-friendly interfaces. Overcoming user skepticism and building trust is essential. Data Privacy and Security: Handling user data in AI and crypto applications requires robust privacy and security measures. Ensuring data protection and transparency will be paramount. Actionable Insights: What Does This Mean for You? Howard Peng’s initiative is a clear signal that the convergence of AI and crypto is gaining momentum, and Telegram is emerging as a key battleground for innovation. Here are some actionable insights to consider: For Developers: Explore the Telegram bot API and the TON blockchain. Start experimenting with building AI-powered crypto applications that address specific user needs within the Telegram ecosystem. For Crypto Enthusiasts: Keep an eye on developments in the AI and crypto space on Telegram. Be open to trying out new AI-powered crypto services as they emerge and provide feedback to developers. For Investors: Pay attention to projects and startups focused on integrating AI and crypto within messaging platforms like Telegram. This could be a high-growth area in the coming years. Conclusion: A Glimpse into the Future of Crypto and AI Howard Peng’s vision to explore the product-market fit of AI and crypto on Telegram is more than just an interesting idea; it’s a potentially transformative step towards the future of both technologies. By leveraging Telegram’s massive user base, open ecosystem, and native blockchain integration, TON Ventures is positioning itself at the forefront of this exciting convergence. The journey to find PMF will undoubtedly be challenging, but the potential rewards – in terms of innovation, user experience, and the evolution of the crypto space – are immense. Keep watching this space; the fusion of AI and crypto on Telegram is a story that’s just beginning to unfold, promising a revolutionary shift in how we interact with digital assets and decentralized technologies. title: Strategic Crypto Acquisition: Base Network Bolsters Privacy by Acquiring Iron Fish Team
body: In a move that’s sending ripples through the crypto sphere, Coinbase-backed layer-2 project Base has strategically acquired the development team behind the privacy-centric blockchain Iron Fish. This bold acquisition signals a significant step towards enhancing privacy-preserving technologies within the Base ecosystem and the broader blockchain landscape. But what exactly does this mean for the future of privacy in crypto, and how will it impact both Base Network and the independent Iron Fish project? Let’s dive into the details of this exciting development. Decoding the Crypto Acquisition: Base Network and Iron Fish Team The headline news is clear: Base Network, a prominent player in layer-2 scaling solutions, has brought on board the talented development team from Iron Fish. This crypto acquisition isn’t about absorbing the Iron Fish project itself. Instead, it’s a strategic talent grab aimed at injecting specialized expertise into Base’s ongoing mission to build a more scalable and user-friendly Web3. Think of it as Base recognizing a crucial ingredient – privacy expertise – and proactively securing it to enrich their own platform. Here’s a breakdown of what you need to know: Base Network’s Objective: To enhance its privacy capabilities and explore new frontiers in privacy-preserving technologies within its layer-2 ecosystem. Iron Fish Team’s Role: The development team, known for their deep understanding of privacy-focused blockchain technology, will now contribute their skills to Base Network. Iron Fish Project’s Independence: Crucially, the Iron Fish project remains independent. It will continue its own trajectory, with founder Elena Nadolinski still actively involved on its foundation’s board. This ensures Iron Fish’s vision and community remain intact. Report Source: The news was initially reported by The Block, a reputable source for crypto news and insights. This acquisition model is interesting. It’s not a project takeover but a strategic hiring of specialized talent. This approach allows Base to rapidly accelerate its privacy initiatives by integrating a team already deeply versed in this complex area. Why Privacy Matters in Layer-2 Scaling Solutions Like Base Network? As blockchain technology matures, the spotlight is increasingly turning towards privacy. While the transparency of public blockchains is a core tenet, it also presents challenges, especially for mainstream adoption. For many applications, and for users in general, a degree of privacy is not just desired, it’s essential. This is where privacy-focused blockchains and privacy-enhancing technologies (PETs) come into play. Layer-2 scaling solutions like Base Network are designed to make blockchain technology faster and cheaper. However, scaling often comes with its own set of privacy considerations. Transactions on layer-2 still ultimately settle on the layer-1 (like Ethereum in Base’s case), and without careful design, privacy can be compromised or overlooked. Here are key reasons why privacy is paramount in layer-2 scaling: User Confidentiality: Users should have the option to keep their transaction details, balances, and interactions private. This is crucial for user autonomy and preventing surveillance. Business Applications: Many business use cases, particularly in finance and supply chain, require confidentiality. Companies often cannot operate transparently on public blockchains due to competitive sensitivities and regulatory requirements. Regulatory Compliance: Data privacy regulations are becoming stricter globally. Solutions that prioritize privacy are better positioned to meet these evolving compliance demands. Security and Anonymity: Privacy can enhance security by making it harder to target specific users or track transaction patterns. Anonymity, when properly implemented, can protect users from various forms of attacks and discrimination. By acquiring the Iron Fish development team, Base Network is clearly signaling its commitment to addressing these critical privacy needs within its ecosystem. This isn’t just about adding a feature; it’s about building a more robust and user-centric platform. Iron Fish: Expertise in Privacy Blockchain Technologies So, why is the Iron Fish team so valuable in the context of privacy blockchain development? Iron Fish is a project specifically built from the ground up with privacy as a core principle. It employs zero-knowledge proofs and other advanced cryptographic techniques to ensure transaction privacy. Their team has deep expertise in: Zero-Knowledge Proofs (ZKPs): Iron Fish leverages ZKPs, a powerful cryptographic tool that allows proving something is true without revealing any underlying information. This is fundamental for private transactions. Cryptographic Protocols: The team has in-depth knowledge of various cryptographic protocols and their application in blockchain privacy. Privacy-Focused Blockchain Architecture: Iron Fish’s architecture is designed with privacy in mind at every layer, from transaction processing to data storage. Community and Research: The Iron Fish team is actively engaged with the privacy research community, staying at the forefront of advancements in the field. Bringing this level of expertise into Base Network is a strategic masterstroke. It’s not just about hiring developers; it’s about integrating a team that has lived and breathed privacy-focused blockchain technology. This depth of experience is invaluable for navigating the complexities of implementing robust privacy solutions in a layer-2 environment. How Will This Acquisition Enhance Base Network’s Privacy Capabilities? The acquisition of the Iron Fish development team positions Base Network to significantly enhance its privacy capabilities. While the exact roadmap and integration plans are yet to be fully unveiled, we can anticipate several key areas of impact: Integration of Privacy Features: The Iron Fish team’s expertise will likely be instrumental in developing and integrating new privacy features directly into the Base Network. This could include options for private transactions, shielded pools, or other privacy-enhancing mechanisms. Research and Development: The team can drive research and development efforts focused on cutting-edge privacy technologies. This could lead to innovative solutions that go beyond current industry standards. Strengthening Base’s Value Proposition: By offering enhanced privacy options, Base Network can differentiate itself from other layer-2 solutions and attract users and developers who prioritize privacy. Contribution to the Broader Ecosystem: Advancements in privacy on Base Network can potentially benefit the entire Ethereum ecosystem and the wider Web3 space, setting new benchmarks for privacy in scalable blockchain solutions. It’s important to remember that building robust privacy solutions is a complex and ongoing endeavor. However, by bringing in a team with proven expertise in this domain, Base Network is taking a decisive and proactive step. This acquisition isn’t just about catching up; it’s about potentially leading the charge in making privacy a fundamental aspect of layer-2 scaling. Looking Ahead: The Future of Privacy in Crypto and Layer-2 Solutions The acquisition of the Iron Fish development team by Base Network is more than just a news story; it’s a strong indicator of the growing importance of privacy in the crypto industry. As Web3 evolves and aims for broader adoption, privacy will be a critical factor in unlocking its full potential. This move by Base highlights a few key trends: Privacy as a Competitive Advantage: Layer-2 solutions are increasingly competing on features and functionality. Privacy is emerging as a significant differentiator and a key area for innovation. Talent Acquisition for Specialization: Acquiring specialized teams is becoming a strategic approach for projects to quickly enhance their capabilities in complex areas like privacy and cryptography. Focus on User Needs: The emphasis on privacy reflects a growing recognition of user needs and the importance of building user-centric blockchain solutions. Continued Innovation in Privacy Technologies: We can expect to see continued advancements in privacy-enhancing technologies, driven by both dedicated privacy projects like Iron Fish and larger ecosystems like Base Network. In conclusion, Base Network’s acquisition of the Iron Fish development team is a remarkable and forward-thinking move. It underscores the rising prominence of privacy in the blockchain space and signals a commitment to building more secure, user-friendly, and privacy-respecting layer-2 solutions. While the Iron Fish project continues its independent journey, its talented team will now play a pivotal role in shaping the future of privacy on Base Network and potentially beyond. This is a development worth watching closely as it unfolds and contributes to the ongoing evolution of Web3. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum institutional adoption.

title: Strategic Bitcoin Reserve: French Hill Urges Trump to Embrace Revolutionary Crypto Policy
body: In a groundbreaking move that could redefine the United States’ stance on digital assets, Congressman French Hill, a prominent figure in financial regulation, has publicly advocated for the establishment of a strategic Bitcoin reserve . This bold proposition, voiced via a statement on X, signals a potential shift towards integrating Bitcoin into the national economic strategy, urging collaboration between the Trump administration and Congress. But what exactly does this mean for the future of crypto in the US and globally? Let’s dive into the details and explore the implications of this exciting development. Why a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve? Understanding French Hill’s Vision French Hill, Chairman of the influential House Financial Services Committee, isn’t just throwing out ideas; he’s strategically positioning Bitcoin as a crucial asset for the nation’s future. His call for a strategic Bitcoin reserve isn’t a mere endorsement of cryptocurrency; it’s a calculated suggestion to leverage Bitcoin’s unique properties for national benefit. Think of it like this: just as nations maintain reserves of gold or oil for economic stability and security, Congressman Hill envisions Bitcoin playing a similar, yet digitally native, role. To fully grasp the significance, let’s break down the potential rationale behind this proposal: Economic Diversification: A strategic Bitcoin reserve could diversify the US’s treasury holdings, reducing reliance on traditional assets and potentially mitigating risks associated with inflation or economic downturns. Technological Leadership: Embracing Bitcoin as a reserve asset would position the US as a leader in the digital asset space, fostering innovation and attracting investment in blockchain technology. National Security: In an increasingly digital world, holding a strategic Bitcoin reserve could enhance national security by providing an alternative financial asset that is decentralized and outside the control of any single entity. Future-Proofing Finances: As digital currencies gain traction globally, establishing a strategic Bitcoin reserve could be a proactive step to ensure the US remains at the forefront of financial evolution. Benefits of a US Strategic Bitcoin Reserve: A Deeper Dive The potential benefits of establishing a strategic Bitcoin reserve are multifaceted and far-reaching. Beyond the points mentioned earlier, let’s explore some key advantages in more detail: Hedge Against Inflation: Bitcoin’s capped supply of 21 million coins makes it a potential hedge against inflation. Unlike fiat currencies, which can be printed by central banks, Bitcoin’s scarcity could preserve its value over time, acting as a store of value in inflationary environments. Decentralization and Security: Bitcoin’s decentralized nature means it’s not subject to the same geopolitical risks as traditional assets. A strategic Bitcoin reserve would be resistant to censorship and seizure, offering a layer of financial security in uncertain times. Increased Bitcoin Adoption: A move by the US to establish a strategic Bitcoin reserve would send a powerful signal to the global market, likely driving further adoption of Bitcoin by institutions and individuals worldwide. This increased demand could positively impact Bitcoin’s value. Innovation and Job Creation: Embracing Bitcoin and blockchain technology can spur innovation across various sectors, leading to the creation of new jobs in fintech, cybersecurity, and related industries. Enhanced Financial Sovereignty: In a world where financial systems are increasingly interconnected and potentially vulnerable, a strategic Bitcoin reserve could enhance the nation’s financial sovereignty by providing an independent and globally accessible asset. Challenges and Considerations for a Bitcoin Reserve While the idea of a strategic Bitcoin reserve is compelling, it’s crucial to acknowledge the challenges and considerations that need to be addressed. Implementing such a policy is not without its hurdles: Volatility: Bitcoin’s price volatility is a significant concern. Fluctuations in value could create accounting and risk management complexities for a national reserve. Robust strategies for managing this volatility would be essential. Regulatory Uncertainty: The regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies is still evolving. Clear and consistent regulations are needed to provide a stable framework for managing a strategic Bitcoin reserve and ensuring compliance. Security and Custody: Securely storing and managing a large Bitcoin reserve is paramount. Robust custody solutions and cybersecurity measures are necessary to prevent theft or loss. Public Perception and Education: Public understanding and acceptance of Bitcoin are still developing. Educating the public and policymakers about the benefits and risks of a strategic Bitcoin reserve is crucial for gaining broader support. Energy Consumption Concerns: Bitcoin mining’s energy consumption has been a point of criticism. Addressing these environmental concerns, perhaps through investments in renewable energy for mining or exploring more energy-efficient consensus mechanisms, would be important for long-term sustainability. The Trump Administration and Crypto: A Potential Turning Point? French Hill’s appeal to the Trump administration is particularly noteworthy given the evolving political landscape surrounding cryptocurrency. While the previous administration’s stance on crypto was sometimes perceived as cautious, there are indications of a potential shift. Encouraging the Trump administration to work with Congress on a strategic Bitcoin reserve could signify a more proactive and potentially positive approach to digital assets. Here are some key questions to consider regarding the Trump administration’s potential role: Will the Trump administration embrace a pro-crypto stance? Recent rhetoric and appointments suggest a potentially more favorable view of digital assets compared to previous years. How will regulatory agencies respond? Collaboration between the administration, Congress, and regulatory bodies like the SEC and CFTC will be crucial for establishing a clear and supportive regulatory framework for Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. What impact will this have on global crypto policy? A US move towards a strategic Bitcoin reserve could influence other nations to reconsider their crypto policies, potentially leading to wider global adoption. Navigating Crypto Regulation: A Balanced Approach The discussion around a strategic Bitcoin reserve underscores the broader need for clear and effective crypto regulation . It’s not just about reserves; it’s about creating a regulatory environment that fosters innovation while protecting consumers and mitigating risks. A balanced approach to crypto regulation is essential for unlocking the full potential of digital assets. Key aspects of effective crypto regulation include: Clarity and Certainty: Regulations should provide clear guidelines for crypto businesses, reducing ambiguity and fostering compliance. Innovation-Friendly Frameworks: Regulations should be designed to encourage innovation and growth in the crypto space, rather than stifling it. Consumer Protection: Safeguarding consumers from fraud and illicit activities is paramount. Regulations should include measures to protect investors and users of crypto platforms. Anti-Money Laundering (AML) and KYC Compliance: Robust AML and Know Your Customer (KYC) regulations are necessary to prevent the use of cryptocurrencies for illegal purposes. International Cooperation: Given the global nature of cryptocurrencies, international cooperation and harmonization of regulations are crucial for effective oversight. Conclusion: A Revolutionary Step Towards Digital Asset Integration? French Hill’s call for a strategic Bitcoin reserve is more than just a suggestion; it’s a bold vision for integrating digital assets into the core of the US financial strategy. While challenges exist, the potential benefits – from economic diversification and technological leadership to enhanced financial sovereignty – are significant. As the Trump administration and Congress consider this revolutionary proposal, the world watches with anticipation. Will the US embrace this opportunity to lead the way in the digital asset era? The answer could reshape the future of finance and solidify Bitcoin’s place in the global economic landscape. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: Netherlands Ranks as the Most Crypto-Obsessed Country in the World
body: A new study has revealed that the Netherlands is the most crypto-obsessed country in the world, based on the number of cryptocurrency-related searches per 100,000 people. Conducted by crypto license lawyers LegalBison, the study analyzed Google search data for terms like “Bitcoin,” “Dogecoin,” and “Cryptocurrency” to determine global interest in digital assets. According to the findings, the Netherlands leads with 5,593 monthly searches per 100,000 people. Liechtenstein follows in second place with 4,470 searches, despite its small population of just 40,000. Switzerland ranks third, registering 4,260 searches per 100,000 people, while Austria and Finland round out the top five with 4,078 and 3,929 searches, respectively. body: The post Chainlink (LINK) Poised for 22% Price Decline, Here’s Why appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Amid the ongoing confusion in the cryptocurrency market, Chainlink’s native token LINK has shown bearish price action and is poised for a decline. However, the current market sentiment remains bearish, with top assets like Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), and XRP also experiencing notable price declines. This downturn is potentially influencing overall market sentiment. Chainlink (LINK) Technical Analysis and Upcoming Levels According to expert technical analysis, LINK appears to be forming a bearish double-top pattern on the four-hour timeframe. While this pattern is yet to be complete, the chart also shows a bearish divergence, further supporting this negative outlook. Based on historical price momentum, if the asset closes below the $16.15 level, there is a strong possibility of a 22% decline, bringing it down to $12.75 in the coming days. A bearish divergence occurs when the Relative Strength Index (RSI) and the double-top pattern align, specifically when the pattern’s tops are parallel while the RSI’s tops decline. Source: Trading View Current Price Momentum Following the formation of the pattern, the asset has begun moving downward. LINK is currently trading near $16.31 and has dropped 4.5% in the past 24 hours. Meanwhile, its trading volume has surged by 12%, indicating increased participation from traders and investors compared to the previous day. Traders Lean Bearish With the ongoing price decline and bearish price action, intraday traders seem to be following the current market sentiment, strongly betting on the bearish side, as reported by the on-chain analytics firm Coinglass . Data reveals that traders are currently over-leveraged, with key levels at $16 on the lower side and $17.50 on the upper side for both bulls and bears. At these levels, they have built $4 million worth of long positions and $10 million worth of short positions, indicating that bears are currently dominating and could push LINK’s price even lower.

title: Pro XRP Lawyer Breaks Silence On Donald Trump’s Executive Order On Bitcoin Reserve
body: Pro-XRP lawyer John E. Deaton has shared his views on former President Donald Trump’s executive order (EO) regarding a U.S. Strategic Bitcoin Reserve (SBR). The EO has sparked debate among cryptocurrency investors and traders, as it confirms that the reserve will only contain Bitcoin obtained through legal forfeitures rather than government purchases. Pro XRP Lawyer John Deaton Comments on Strategic Bitcoin Reserve In an X post responding to investor Scott Melker, Pro-XRP lawyer John E. Deaton acknowledged concerns within the crypto community regarding the EO. While some traders expected the U.S. government to actively buy Bitcoin and other digital assets, Deaton emphasized that the EO is as aggressive as a president can be without emergency powers. The pro-XRP lawyer explained that the Exchange Stabilization Fund (ESF) grants the U.S. Treasury Secretary broad authority to hold financial assets to stabilize markets. However, he noted that any direct government Bitcoin purchase could face legal challenges. Deaton stated, “I’m not suggesting that Secretary Bessent will be buying BTC tomorrow, because, no doubt, it would be challenged in Court.” Pro-XRP lawyer John E. Deaton also pointed out that more extreme actions, such as invoking the International Emergency Economic Powers Act (IEEPA) or the Defense Production Act, would be unrealistic. Crypto Market Reaction to the Executive Order Following the yesterday’s announcement, cryptocurrency prices experienced a decline. Bitcoin price fell as much as 6.6% before rebounding slightly to around $89,000. Other digital assets, including Ethereum, Cardano, Solana, and XRP, also recorded losses. Investors had anticipated that the U.S. government might purchase Bitcoin, leading to increased demand. Trump’s earlier social media post suggested that various cryptocurrencies, including Ethereum, XRP, Cardano, and Solana, could be part of a strategic reserve. However, the EO clarified that the government would not acquire additional assets beyond those seized by law enforcement. The executive order also introduced a separate national digital assets stockpile for non-Bitcoin tokens. However, the White House did not specify which cryptocurrencies would be included or how they would be managed. Bitcoin’s Role in U.S. Financial Strategy Supporters of the Strategic Bitcoin Reserve argue that Bitcoin serves as a valuable asset similar to gold. Some believe that holding Bitcoin could provide financial stability and act as a hedge against inflation. White House advisor David Sacks referred to the reserve as a “digital Fort Knox,” reinforcing the idea that the government sees Bitcoin as a store of value rather than an active investment. Sacks estimated that the U.S. holds around 200,000 Bitcoins, worth approximately $17.8 billion. He assured transparency regarding the government’s digital asset holdings and stated that the U.S. would not sell its Bitcoin from the reserve. Despite this, financial analysts view the move as largely symbolic, as there is no clear plan to expand the holdings through new acquisitions. Implications for Crypto Regulation and Global Adoption Industry experts believe that the establishment of a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve reduces the likelihood of a U.S. government crackdown on Bitcoin. Matt Hougan, the Bitwise CIO, noted that the move could encourage other nations to create similar reserves. “The U.S. will not ban Bitcoin. This increases the likelihood that other nations will follow suit,” Hougan posted on X. He added that the decision could accelerate global Bitcoin adoption and make it harder for institutions to argue against holding digital assets. Moreover, with the White House hosting major crypto industry leaders , including Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong, Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse and MicroStrategy’s Michael Saylor, discussions on digital asset policies are expected to continue. While the EO may not have met all investor expectations, it signals a shift in the U.S. government’s approach to Bitcoin and digital assets. The post Pro XRP Lawyer Breaks Silence On Donald Trump’s Executive Order On Bitcoin Reserve appeared first on CoinGape .

title: JTO price stuck in a bear market as Jito’s revenue hits $410m
body: Jito price remains in a deep bear market after falling by over 40% from its highest level in December last year. Jito ( JTO ), the biggest liquid staking and restaking network on Solana, was trading at $2.5, bringing its market cap to $787 million. Third-party data shows that Jito has become the third most profitable players in the crypto industry after Tether and Tron ( TRX ). It has made $411 million this year, making it more profitable than popular chains like Solana ( SOL ) and Ethereum ( ETH ). Jito, which has $2.34 billion in assets, is even more profitable than Lido, the biggest liquid staking player in crypto, which has over $20 billion in assets. The token has likely underperformed because of its tokenomics. It has a maximum supply of 999.9 million tokens against a circulating supply of 301 million. It then unlocks 11.31 million JTO tokens each month, a process that will continue until December 2026. You might also like: Here’s why crypto prices may crash after the Trump summit Token unlocks are usually bearish since they introduce new tokens and dilute existing holders. In line with this, the developers proposed a new method of improving its tokenomics and potentially boosting its price. If agreed by the community, Jito will evamp its tokenomics by introducing buybacks and barter, real yield gauges, and rewards or fee switch mechanisms. Real yield gauges is inspired by Curve, while buyback and barter is a process where protocol fees are swapped to JTO tokens and then deployed to partner DAOs. It is unclear which option that the Jito Foundation will opt. However, chances are that the proposal the community selects will help to boost the JTO token price. Jito price analysis JTO price chart | Source: crypto.news The daily chart shows that the JTO price has pulled back in the past few weeks, even as the protocol revenue has risen. It dropped from $4.3 in December to $2.5. The coin has moved slightly below the 25 and 50-day Exponential Moving Averages, a bearish sign. On the positive side, it is in the process of forming a falling wedge pattern, a popular bullish reversal sign. This pattern is made up of two converging downward-sloping trendlines. A breakout happens when the two lines are about to meet. Therefore, the coin will likely have a strong bullish breakout, with the next point to watch being at $4.33, its highest level in December.
