title: Avalanche Joins Forces with an Indian Town to Digitize Over 700,000 Land Records
body: Avalanche, the leading blockchain, in a move towards diversifying the practical applications of Blockchain beyond just financial and investment streams, has revealed an exciting collaboration with an Indian Startup, Zupple using its platform. In order to solve the traditional problems associated with land record keeping systems, an Indian town, Dantewada, has digitized over 700k of their land records on Avalanche Blockchain. As per the revelation, land records dating back to the 1950s have now been stored on the Avalanche Blockchain with support from Zupple’s LegitDoc Platform, making them tamper-proof and secure. The project has been spearheaded by the CEO of Dantewada Zila Panchayat, Jayant Mehta, in coordination with Indian Administrative Service (IAS) officer Mayank Chaturvedi, District Collector of Dantewada, and is being mplemented under the division of the Office of Land Records. The initiative aims to enhance transparency, prevent land disputes, and modernize property management using blockchain technology – marking a significant milestone in India’s Digital Future. How Blockchain-Based Land Registry can help India has long faced challenges related to land ownership, including forgery, bureaucratic inefficiencies, and lengthy legal battles over disputed properties. Half of the pending litigations and cases before the Indian Judiciary are based on disputed claims between two persons/entities on same peice of land. By transitioning land records onto a blockchain ledger, authorities aim to tackle these persistent issues head-on. Avalanche’s blockchain technology can ensure that every transaction and update made to land records via its chain is permanently recorded and cannot be altered. This system will reduce the likelihood of fraud and unauthorized modifications, providing a higher level of trust among landowners, businesses, and government agencies. Sharing more insights on the implementation, Avalanche revealed in a X post that the Dantewada administration, in order to implement it, has installed small booths in every sub-district of the town, where citizens and government officers can access land information. This new integration on Avalanche will allow officials to search for land properties, download and view the digitized records on the blockchain. The app will also allow land officers and citizens to verify the smart contracts linked to the digital documents over the Avalanche Explorer, ensuring tamper-proof record keeping. Snapshot from Avalanche Explorer showing how it records Transactions Digitizing land records on a decentralized ledger would significantly cut down processing times for land transactions, eliminating middlemen, and improving efficiency in granting property rights. Smart contracts, a key feature of blockchain technology, can be employed to automate processes such as title transfers and property sales, reducing delays and enhancing transparency. Potential Economic and Social Impact The digitization of land records using blockchain technology could have far-reaching economic and social implications. A streamlined and trustworthy land administration system could boost investor confidence, attracting more real estate and infrastructure investments to the region. Further, this will significantly help indebted people in rural regions where poor people are often snatched off their property rights, owing to non-payment debt. A usual scenario, where a person even after paying debt cannot establish ownership claims on his property, is common in rural regions of India. Thus, individuals from rural areas who lack proper land documentation could benefit immensely. Secure land records can serve as proof of ownership, enabling landowners to access financial services such as loans and mortgages. Instances of fraud and loss of registration papers would also be reduced. The administrative system could also receive help in the implementation of government policies related to land reforms, urban planning, and agricultural development. India’s Growing Blockchain Adoption India has been steadily adopting blockchain technology in various sectors, from finance to governance. State governments in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, and Maharashtra have already initiated blockchain-based projects for land records and other administrative processes. Notably, in 2023, Niti Aayog, an Indian government think tank, declared a Maharashtra blockchain caste certification pilot, in association with Zupple on Polygon PoS Blockchain – making it the first time such recognition and recommendation for the use of public blockchain in E-governance was implemented. Niti-Aayog has declared a Maharashtra blockchain caste certification pilot, in association w/ @0xZupple , a model project in the social sector. This is the first time an Indian gov. think tank has recognized & recommended the use of public blockchain in E-governance #onPolygon — Polygon ※ (@0xPolygon) June 6, 2023 In October 2023, Hindustan Petroleum Corporation Limited (HPCL) also collaborated with Zupple to enhance its purchase order processes using blockchain technology. With the growing emphasis on digital transformation, more Indian municipalities are expected to explore blockchain-based solutions to enhance governance and service delivery. Avalanche’s entry into this space underscores the increasing interest from global blockchain firms in India’s public sector initiatives. What’s Next for the Project? The rollout of this blockchain-based land record system will take place in multiple phases. Initially, authorities will conduct a pilot program covering a limited number of records before expanding to all 700,000 land parcels. Experts believe that if the initiative proves successful, it could serve as a model for other municipal towns and cities across India and even for other countries. With the rise of digital governance, more governments are already looking towards blockchain as a tool to enhance efficiency, reduce corruption, and ensure equitable property rights. As India continues its journey towards digital innovation, projects like these demonstrate the potential of blockchain technology in reshaping traditional bureaucratic processes and bringing long-term benefits to citizens and businesses alike. The post Avalanche Joins Forces with an Indian Town to Digitize Over 700,000 Land Records appeared first on CoinGape .

title: SEC Drops Multiple Lawsuits and Investigations Against Crypto Firms—Here’s the List
body: The SEC has dropped or paused lawsuits and investigations against multiple crypto firms, including Binance and Coinbase. Most cases were dismissed in February and March 2025. Meanwhile, Ripple’s case remains active in the appellate court. In recent weeks, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has paused or dismissed multiple lawsuits and investigations involving major cryptocurrency firms. This has marked a big change in regulatory enforcement. The move comes after leadership changes inside the agency and the creation of a Crypto Task Force to rethink enforcement priorities. Companies such as Binance, Coinbase, Kraken, and Uniswap are among those affected. The decisions, announced between February and early March, suggest a coordinated change in approach. SEC Lawsuit Wave: Suddenly Halted The SEC had previously filed lawsuits and launched investigations against various crypto companies over alleged securities violations. Binance and Coinbase were sued in June 2023, while Uniswap, Kraken, and OpenSea came under scrutiny in 2024. However, recent announcements confirm that these actions have either been dropped or put on hold. title: Shocking Yescoin Founder Detention: Business Dispute Rocks TON Ecosystem
body: In a startling turn of events, the crypto world is buzzing with news of the Yescoin founder, Zhang Chi’s detention. Yescoin (YES), a popular mini-game within the Telegram Open Network (TON) ecosystem, has confirmed that its founder, Zhang Chi, is currently in police custody in Shanghai. This news has sent ripples through the crypto community, raising questions about the future of Yescoin and the broader implications for projects within the TON ecosystem. Let’s delve into the details of this developing story and understand what it means for Yescoin users and the crypto landscape. What We Know About the Yescoin Founder, Zhang Chi’s Detention According to an official announcement from the Yescoin team on X (formerly Twitter), Zhang Chi was detained by Shanghai police due to an ongoing business dispute with his partner, Wang Mouxin. Initially classified as a civil matter, the case has unfortunately escalated into a criminal investigation. While details remain scarce, the core issue seems to stem from disagreements between Zhang Chi and Wang Mouxin regarding their business operations. Here’s a quick breakdown of what we know: Founder Detained: Yescoin founder Zhang Chi is in custody of Shanghai police. Business Dispute: The detention is linked to a business dispute with partner Wang Mouxin. Criminal Case: The dispute, initially civil, has become a criminal case. Operational Continuity: Yescoin team assures users the platform operates normally. Community Support: Yescoin team thanked the community for their ongoing support during this uncertain time. The escalation from a civil dispute to a criminal case is a significant development, suggesting the allegations against Zhang Chi are serious. The crypto community is keenly watching for further updates as they unfold. Impact on the TON Ecosystem and Yescoin Operations Yescoin, being a prominent mini-game within the TON Ecosystem , naturally raises concerns about the project’s stability and future. The TON ecosystem itself is a vibrant and growing blockchain platform, and Yescoin’s popularity has contributed to its expansion. The immediate question on everyone’s mind is: will this detention disrupt Yescoin’s operations? The Yescoin team has been quick to reassure its community that it’s business as usual. In their official statement, they emphasized that the platform continues to operate normally. This suggests that the team has contingency plans in place to ensure the project’s continuity even in the absence of its founder. However, the long-term implications remain to be seen. Investor confidence and user sentiment can be sensitive to such events, and prolonged uncertainty could potentially impact Yescoin’s growth trajectory. Navigating the Challenges of Crypto Business Disputes This incident highlights the inherent challenges within the burgeoning crypto space, particularly regarding business disputes and legal frameworks. The decentralized and often borderless nature of crypto can complicate legal proceedings and dispute resolutions. While the specifics of the Zhang Chi case are unique, it serves as a stark reminder of the importance of robust legal agreements and clear operational guidelines in crypto ventures. Here are some key challenges and considerations: Regulatory Uncertainty: Crypto regulations are still evolving globally, leading to legal ambiguities in business disputes. Decentralized Nature: Cross-border operations and decentralized structures can complicate jurisdiction and enforcement. Partner Relationships: As with any business, disagreements among partners can arise, and in crypto, the stakes can be particularly high due to market volatility and rapid growth. Transparency and Communication: Maintaining transparent communication with the community is crucial during crises to manage user confidence and prevent panic. What Does this Mean for Yescoin Users? Actionable Insights For Yescoin users, the immediate message from the team is clear: continue playing and engaging as usual. The platform is operational, and the team is working to maintain normalcy. However, it’s always prudent to stay informed and exercise caution, especially in the volatile crypto market. Actionable Insights for Yescoin Users: Stay Informed: Follow Yescoin’s official communication channels (X, Telegram, etc.) for updates. Community Engagement: Engage with the Yescoin community to gauge sentiment and share information. Risk Management: Remember that all crypto investments carry risk. Diversification and cautious participation are always recommended. Platform Functionality: Continue to monitor the platform’s functionality and report any issues to the team. While the detention of Zhang Chi is undoubtedly concerning, the Yescoin team’s proactive communication and commitment to operational continuity are positive signs. The crypto community will be closely watching how this situation unfolds and its broader implications for the TON ecosystem and the crypto regulatory landscape. The Future of Yescoin and Crypto Project Leadership The long-term future of Yescoin and the question of leadership are now central to discussions within the community. How will Yescoin navigate this period of uncertainty? Will the existing team be able to effectively steer the project forward? These are critical questions that will determine Yescoin’s resilience and long-term success. This incident also prompts a broader reflection on leadership within crypto projects. The often-anonymous or semi-anonymous nature of crypto founders can present unique challenges when legal or personal issues arise. Transparency, clear succession plans, and robust governance structures are becoming increasingly important as the crypto industry matures. In conclusion, the detention of Yescoin founder Zhang Chi is a significant event that underscores the complexities and risks inherent in the crypto world. While the Yescoin team assures continued operations, the situation warrants close monitoring. It serves as a crucial reminder of the importance of legal compliance, robust business practices, and transparent communication in the rapidly evolving crypto landscape. The crypto community awaits further developments in this shocking case, hoping for a swift and equitable resolution that minimizes disruption to the Yescoin project and the wider TON ecosystem. title: Cosmos price prediction 2025-2031: Will ATOM recover ATH?
body: Key takeaways : Cosmos’s price is predicted to reach a maximum value of $6.80 in 2025. In 2028, the coin could be worth between $18.49 and $21.97, with an average price of $19.01. By 2031, Cosmos (ATOM) might touch $67.56. Cosmos (ATOM) is a blockchain ecosystem that facilitates interoperability among independent blockchains. Co-founded by Jae Kwon and Ethan Buchman in 2014, Cosmos aims to create a decentralized network of blockchains that can communicate and transact seamlessly. Its main components include the Cosmos Hub, which serves as the central chain, and multiple “zones” that operate under their own rules while connecting to the Hub. The platform uses the Tendermint consensus algorithm and Inter-Blockchain Communication (IBC) protocol to enable fast low-cost transactions. Fees average around $0.01, and confirmation times are approximately seven seconds. Cosmos employs a Proof-of-Stake (PoS) mechanism, allowing users to stake their ATOM tokens for network security and transaction validation. Since its ICO in 2017, Cosmos has raised significant funding and established a growing ecosystem, including notable projects like Terra and Binance. With over 286 million ATOM tokens in circulation and a market cap exceeding $7.7 billion, Cosmos is positioned as a key player in the evolving landscape of blockchain technology, often referred to as the “Internet of Blockchains” for its ambitious goal of connecting diverse blockchain networks. Cosmos historic price sentiment Cosmos price history Cosmos, created by Ethan Buchman and Jae Kwon, launched its Initial Coin Offering (ICO) in 2017, with the network officially going live two years later in 2019. During the bullish market cycle of 2021, Cosmos saw its price peak at over $44, driven by significant investor interest and market optimism. However, following this surge, on 3rd April 2022, the price of Cosmos (ATOM) sharply declined to $6.39. Since then, Cosmos entered a prolonged phase of consolidation, trading within a range between $6.39 and $16 as market dynamics fluctuated. In early 2024, particularly around 8th March, Cosmos encountered significant resistance at the $13 level, struggling to gain momentum above this point. This resistance reflected broader market sentiment and potential selling pressure. By July 2024, ATOM’s price was trading in a narrower range, between $5 and $6, indicating a lack of upward momentum. By August 2024, the price had further dipped to $4.02, suggesting increasing bearish pressure. This recent decline highlights ongoing challenges for Cosmos in maintaining its price stability and suggests potential further downside as market bears dominate, putting pressure on potential buyers to defend against a continued downward trend. On September 2024, the Cosmos price ranged between $4 to $5, and on October 06, the price traded at $4.5837 with a trading volume of $48.48M. On November 5, ATOM was trading at $4.10. By December 5, ATOM’s price surged significantly, trading at $10. Cosmos ATOM surged to $9 at the start of December 2024, but it declined to $9.6 and closed the year at $6.3. In January 2025, Cosmos peaked at $7.77, and in February, it’s trading between $4.54 and $4.86. ATOM value decreased further in March as it dipped to the $4.0 to $4.2 range.

title: Urgent Call: US Treasury Secretary Champions Bitcoin Leadership, Demands BTC Sales Halt
body: Hold onto your hats, crypto enthusiasts! The winds are shifting in Washington, and it sounds like Bitcoin is finally getting the attention it deserves from the top echelons of power. U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent has just dropped a bombshell, signaling a potentially seismic shift in the U.S. approach to cryptocurrency, particularly Bitcoin. Let’s dive into what this could mean for the future of Bitcoin and the U.S.’s role in the global crypto landscape. Why is Bitcoin Leadership Suddenly a Priority for the U.S. Treasury? For years, the relationship between traditional finance and cryptocurrencies has been… complicated, to say the least. Skepticism, cautious regulation, and sometimes outright hostility have characterized the stance of many government bodies. So, why the sudden change of heart? Why is the U.S. Treasury now talking about Bitcoin leadership ? Several factors could be at play: Geopolitical Strategy: In a world increasingly shaped by technological innovation and digital assets, countries are vying for dominance in the crypto space. Recognizing Bitcoin’s significance, the U.S. may be aiming to secure a leading position rather than being left behind. Economic Opportunity: The cryptocurrency industry is a multi-billion dollar sector, and growing. Embracing Bitcoin leadership could attract investment, innovation, and jobs to the U.S., boosting the economy. National Security: Ignoring or suppressing Bitcoin could push innovation offshore, potentially weakening the U.S.’s technological and financial standing. Taking a proactive stance allows for better oversight and control within the domestic sphere. Investor Protection (Potentially): While not explicitly stated, a more supportive stance could lead to clearer regulatory frameworks, ultimately offering better protection for investors within the crypto market. It’s crucial to note that this is a developing situation. Secretary Bessent’s comments are a significant signal, but the actual policies and actions that follow will determine the true impact. However, the shift in rhetoric is undeniable and certainly noteworthy. Decoding the Call to Halt BTC Sales: A Strategic Masterstroke? One of the most intriguing aspects of Secretary Bessent’s statement is the call to halt government BTC sales . This is a potentially massive development, and here’s why: Reduced Market Pressure: Governments, particularly those involved in seizures or early Bitcoin acquisitions, sometimes hold significant amounts of BTC. Regular sales from these holdings can exert downward pressure on the Bitcoin market. Halting these sales could alleviate some of that pressure, potentially stabilizing or even boosting prices. Symbol of Confidence: Stopping BTC sales could be interpreted as a sign of confidence in Bitcoin’s long-term value. It suggests that the U.S. Treasury views Bitcoin not as a liability to be disposed of, but as an asset to be held or even strategically managed. Strategic Accumulation (Possible Future Implication): While not explicitly stated, halting sales could be a precursor to a more strategic approach to Bitcoin, which might even involve future accumulation. This is speculative, but it’s a possibility worth considering. To truly understand the impact of halting BTC sales , we need more clarity on which government entities are currently selling Bitcoin and the scale of these sales. However, the very suggestion of stopping these sales is a significant departure from a purely reactive or dismissive approach to Bitcoin. Bringing Bitcoin Onshore: Reclaiming Crypto Innovation Secretary Bessent’s emphasis on “bringing Bitcoin onshore” is another key element of his statement. What does this actually mean, and why is it important? Bringing Bitcoin onshore can be interpreted in several ways, all pointing towards fostering a more favorable environment for Bitcoin-related activities within the United States: Attracting Businesses: Creating a regulatory landscape that is clear, predictable, and supportive can attract Bitcoin companies, exchanges, and innovators to establish or expand their operations in the U.S. Currently, some companies are hesitant due to regulatory uncertainty. Encouraging Mining: Bitcoin mining, while energy-intensive, is a crucial part of the Bitcoin network. Bringing Bitcoin onshore could involve policies that support sustainable mining practices within the U.S., ensuring network security and decentralization are geographically distributed. Talent Retention and Attraction: A thriving Bitcoin industry in the U.S. will attract and retain top talent in blockchain technology, cryptography, and finance. This brain gain is essential for maintaining a competitive edge in the digital economy. Regulatory Clarity: Perhaps most importantly, bringing Bitcoin onshore necessitates clear and sensible cryptocurrency regulation . Businesses and individuals need to understand the rules of the game to operate confidently and compliantly. The challenge, of course, lies in crafting regulations that are both effective in protecting consumers and preventing illicit activities, while also fostering innovation and avoiding stifling growth. It’s a delicate balance, but Secretary Bessent’s statement suggests a willingness to strike that balance in a way that supports Bitcoin leadership . The Role of Cryptocurrency Regulation in Achieving Bitcoin Leadership Let’s face it, the elephant in the room when it comes to cryptocurrency is regulation. For the U.S. to truly achieve Bitcoin leadership , a robust and forward-thinking regulatory framework is absolutely essential. But what kind of cryptocurrency regulation is needed? Here are some key considerations: Aspect of Regulation Why It’s Important for Bitcoin Leadership Clarity and Certainty Businesses need to know the rules to operate and invest confidently. Vague or conflicting regulations stifle innovation. Innovation-Friendly Approach Regulations should encourage responsible innovation, not stifle it. A balanced approach is needed to foster growth while managing risks. Consumer Protection Protecting investors and users from fraud and scams is paramount. Effective regulation builds trust in the crypto space. Anti-Money Laundering (AML) and Combating the Financing of Terrorism (CFT) Addressing legitimate concerns about illicit activities is crucial for mainstream acceptance and regulatory approval. Interoperability and Global Standards Harmonizing regulations with international standards can facilitate cross-border transactions and prevent regulatory arbitrage. Secretary Bessent’s remarks suggest a potential shift towards a more constructive and proactive approach to cryptocurrency regulation . Whether this translates into tangible policy changes remains to be seen, but the signal is encouraging for the crypto industry. Actionable Insights: What Does This Mean for You? So, what should you, as a crypto enthusiast or investor, take away from this news? Here are some actionable insights: Stay Informed: Keep a close watch on developments coming out of the U.S. Treasury and other regulatory bodies. Policy changes can have a significant impact on the crypto market. Consider U.S.-Focused Crypto Projects: If the U.S. does indeed move towards a more supportive stance on Bitcoin and crypto, projects based in or focused on the U.S. market could benefit. Advocate for Sensible Regulation: Engage with policymakers and industry groups to advocate for cryptocurrency regulation that balances innovation with consumer protection. Your voice matters! Long-Term Optimism (Cautiously): While regulatory landscapes are always subject to change, Secretary Bessent’s statement offers a reason for cautious long-term optimism about Bitcoin’s future in the U.S. and globally. Conclusion: A Pivotal Moment for Bitcoin and U.S. Crypto Strategy Secretary Bessent’s statement is more than just words; it’s a potential turning point. His call for Bitcoin leadership , halting BTC sales , and bringing Bitcoin onshore signals a significant shift in the U.S. government’s approach to cryptocurrency. While challenges remain, and concrete policy changes are still needed, this is undoubtedly a positive development for the Bitcoin community and the broader crypto ecosystem. The journey to true Bitcoin leadership is just beginning, but the U.S. Treasury has just signaled it’s ready to take the reins. The world will be watching closely. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin institutional adoption.

title: BREAKING: FED Chair Jerome Powell is Speaking – Here’s What He Says at a Critical Crossroad
body: Fed Chairman Jerome Powell speaks at the 2025 U.S. Monetary Policy Forum at the University of Chicago Booth School of Business in New York. Here are the highlights from Powell's critical speech: The Fed is in no rush to adjust interest rates. The labor market is solid and generally balanced. Inflation is slightly above the 2% target but is gradually approaching it. Uncertainty about the Trump administration’s policies and their economic impact remains high. Some recent inflation expectations surveys and market indicators have shown increases due to tariffs. Most long-term inflation expectations remain stable and consistent with the 2% target. The Fed is fully prepared to wait for a clearer picture. The net effect of trade, immigration, fiscal and regulatory policies is the factor that has the greatest impact on economic and monetary policy. The Fed's policy is not set in stone; if inflation progress stagnates, policy may remain restrictive, or if the labor market weakens unexpectedly or inflation declines unexpectedly, policy may be eased. Related News: White House Official Makes Very Confusing Statement About Cardano (ADA), Ripple (XRP) and Solana (SOL) - Bringing a Drop Despite high uncertainty, the US economy is in good shape. The path to achieving the 2% inflation target will be bumpy; the Fed will not overreact to one or two economic data reports that are higher or lower than expected. Recent indicators point to a possible slowdown in consumer spending and increased uncertainty; it remains to be seen how these developments will impact future spending and investment. Fed Chair Powell reiterated that the 2% inflation target is not the focus of the Fed's framework review; the results of the review will be released in late summer. U.S. short-term interest rate futures maintained their forecast that the Fed will cut interest rates in June and expect a total of three rate cuts in 2025 after Powell said the Fed did not need to rush to act. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: BREAKING: FED Chair Jerome Powell is Speaking – Here’s What He Says at a Critical Crossroad

title: Bitcoin staking layer Core integrates Cobo to expand dual BTC staking in Asia
body: Core, a proof of stake platform offering a dual Bitcoin staking solution, is teaming up with digital asset custody and wallet provider Cobo to expand its staking service in Asia. The collaboration will see Core and Cobo bring dual Bitcoin ( BTC ) staking and sustainable yield to institutional investors, Core Foundation announced on Mar. 7. In the announcement, shared with crypto.news via a press release, noted that Core will bring these features to users eyeing opportunities in the decentralized finance ecosystem across Asia. Core plans to offer this functionality via its DeFi-as-a-Service platform, with its sights on institutional adoption of BTC staking. “Our integration with Cobo, a trusted leader in digital asset custody and blockchain infrastructure, greatly enhances the Core ecosystem by onboarding liquidity from high-caliber institutional clients,” Brendon Sedo, an initial contributor at Core, said. Read more: The Core Foundation and partners launch new institutional Bitcoin yield token The integration means Cobo users can now stake both Bitcoin and CORE tokens to earn BTC yields. Core will allow institutional investors to leverage the platform’s overall accessibility to benefit from “sustainable and self-custodial Bitcoin yields.” Cobo’s blockchain solutions, which includes a secure and scalable network, will be key to this goal, Sedo added. “By integrating Core’s innovative Dual Staking model with Cobo’s trusted infrastructure, we’re further advancing institutional access to scalable and sustainable Bitcoin yields, paving the way for broader adoption of secure BTC staking solutions,” Changhao Jiang, chief technology officer of Cobo, noted. Core Foundation’s collaboration with Cobo builds on the platform’s previous traction in the Bitcoin staking, with institutions having leveraged its layer to stake more than 6,200 BTC. Core’s end-to-end Bitcoin finance solution also features network security by miners. Miners earn CORE tokens when they help secure the network by delegating hash power, with this around 76% of delegated Bitcoin hashrate. Core launched in 2023 and growth in the BTCfi ecosystem has seen Core integrate more than 150 Ethereum Virtual Machine-compatible decentralized applications. In December 2024, Core teamed up with Hashnote to unlock more BTC yields for users. That partnership helped bump Core’s total value locked, or TVL, which currently stands at over $525 million . Meanwhile, Cobot, founded in 2017, has helped over 500 digital asset businesses tap into on-chain opportunities. You might also like: Maple Finance launches Bitcoin-linked yield product

title: White House Crypto Summit 2025 : Live Updates
body: The post White House Crypto Summit 2025 : Live Updates appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News March 7, 2025 18:10:09 UTC Senator Cynthia Lummis won’t Attend White House Crypto Summit Due to Illness Wyoming Senator @SenLummis announced that she will not be attending the White House Crypto Summit because of illness. This update comes as the event draws near, with many industry leaders and policymakers gathering to discuss the future of digital assets. Best wishes for a great crypto summit at the White House today. I'm home sick with pneumonia this week and sad that I won't be there. We hope to get bitcoin and digital asset legislation to your desk soon, President Trump! — Senator Cynthia Lummis (@SenLummis) March 7, 2025 March 7, 2025 17:54:21 UTC Bitcoin Is a Scarce and Strategic Reserve Asset, Says David Sacks Crypto Czar David Sacks stated, “Bitcoin is scarce, it’s valuable, and that is strategic for the United States to hold on to this as a long-term reserve asset.” His comments underscore the belief that Bitcoin’s limited supply and intrinsic value make it an ideal candidate for a long-term reserve, aligning with broader strategies to secure financial stability in an evolving digital economy. March 7, 2025 17:49:45 UTC David Sacks : Trump’s Inclusion of XRP, ADA, and Solana Is Market Cap-Driven David Sacks explained that when Trump mentioned XRP, Solana, and Cardano in his crypto reserve statement, he was simply referring to the top five cryptocurrencies by market cap, with no deeper meaning. Sacks also noted that the government might explore lending or staking its crypto holdings. The Treasury Department would handle any rebalancing, sales, or other asset management strategies based on long-term interests. March 7, 2025 16:09:35 UTC White House Not Expecting Tax Policy Announcements at Crypto Summit According to @PunchbowlNews and @BrendanPedersen, the White House is not anticipating any new announcements on tax policy at today’s crypto summit. The focus is expected to remain on broader digital asset discussions, leaving tax policy for future deliberations. March 7, 2025 16:09:35 UTC When is Trumps Crypto Summit? On March 7, 2025, the White House will host Crypto Summit, uniting government officials, regulators, and top crypto industry leaders. This event marks the highest-level political support for cryptocurrency regulation and innovation in the United States. The summit will focus on shaping future digital asset policies and fostering blockchain innovation, signaling a major step toward integrating crypto into the mainstream financial system.

title: Shocking Jobs Report: US Nonfarm Payrolls Underwhelm, Crypto Market Braces for Impact
body: Cryptocurrency enthusiasts and investors, are you watching the economic indicators closely? The latest U.S. nonfarm payrolls data just dropped, and it’s sending ripples across traditional markets – and potentially the crypto sphere too. February’s jobs report has landed below expectations, raising eyebrows and sparking questions about the Federal Reserve’s next moves. Let’s dive into what this means and why it should be on your crypto radar. Why Did the February Jobs Report Miss Market Expectations? The U.S. jobs report for February revealed an increase of 151,000 nonfarm payrolls, a figure that fell short of the anticipated 159,000. While any job growth is generally positive, the miss against forecasts is significant. This data point, released by the U.S. Department of Labor, is a crucial barometer of the US economy’s health. Several factors could contribute to this slight dip, including seasonal adjustments, weather impacts, or potentially a subtle cooling in certain sectors. Let’s break down the key figures: Nonfarm Payrolls: Increased by 151,000 in February (Expected: 159,000) Unemployment Rate: Rose slightly to 4.1% (Forecast: 4.0%) While the unemployment rate saw a marginal increase, it remains at a historically low level. However, the combination of lower-than-expected job creation and a tick up in unemployment can paint a mixed picture of the labor market. What Does This Mean for the Crypto Market? You might be wondering, “Why should crypto investors care about nonfarm payrolls ?” The answer lies in the interconnectedness of global finance. Traditional economic indicators like the jobs report significantly influence Federal Reserve policy, interest rates, and overall investor sentiment – all of which can indirectly and sometimes directly impact the cryptocurrency market. Here’s how this data point can create ripples in the crypto world: Federal Reserve Policy: Weaker-than-expected job growth could make the Federal Reserve more cautious about raising interest rates aggressively. Lower interest rates can be perceived as positive for risk assets like cryptocurrencies, as they reduce the attractiveness of traditional fixed-income investments. Dollar Strength: A slightly weaker jobs report might lead to a temporary weakening of the U.S. dollar. Historically, a weaker dollar can sometimes correlate with increased interest in alternative assets like Bitcoin, which are seen as hedges against currency devaluation. Investor Sentiment: Economic uncertainty stemming from mixed economic data can lead to increased market volatility. In such times, some investors may seek refuge in assets perceived as having limited correlation with traditional markets, and cryptocurrencies can sometimes be viewed in this light, although their volatility is a key consideration. Navigating Market Expectations and Crypto Investments Understanding market expectations is crucial for any investor, especially in the fast-paced world of cryptocurrency. Financial markets, including crypto, are forward-looking. They often react more to surprises or deviations from anticipated trends than to the absolute numbers themselves. In this case, the slight miss in nonfarm payrolls is the surprise element. Actionable Insights for Crypto Investors: Stay Informed: Keep an eye on further economic data releases and statements from the Federal Reserve. These will provide more clues about the future direction of monetary policy. Manage Risk: Market uncertainty can amplify volatility. Ensure your portfolio is appropriately diversified and that you are managing your risk tolerance effectively. Consider Dollar-Cost Averaging: In volatile periods, dollar-cost averaging (DCA) can be a prudent strategy to mitigate risk and build positions over time. Long-Term Perspective: Remember that economic data is just one piece of the puzzle. The long-term fundamentals of many cryptocurrencies, including technological advancements and adoption rates, remain important drivers. Challenges and Opportunities in a Dynamic Economic Landscape The current economic landscape presents both challenges and opportunities for crypto investors. Challenges include: Increased Volatility: Economic uncertainty often leads to higher market volatility across all asset classes, including cryptocurrencies. Regulatory Scrutiny: Governments and regulatory bodies worldwide are increasingly focusing on cryptocurrency regulation, which can introduce uncertainty and impact market sentiment. Macroeconomic Factors: Cryptocurrencies are not immune to broader macroeconomic trends. Inflation, interest rate changes, and global economic growth can all influence crypto markets. However, there are also significant opportunities : Hedge Against Inflation: Some investors view cryptocurrencies, particularly Bitcoin, as a potential hedge against inflation, although this narrative is still evolving. Decentralized Finance (DeFi): The growth of DeFi offers new avenues for earning yield and participating in financial markets outside of traditional systems. Technological Innovation: The underlying technology of blockchain and cryptocurrencies continues to evolve, creating new use cases and potential for future growth. The Bigger Picture: US Economy and the Crypto Ecosystem The US economy remains a global powerhouse, and its performance has far-reaching consequences. While the February jobs report might be slightly underwhelming, it’s crucial to remember that it’s just one data point in a complex economic narrative. The crypto ecosystem, while still relatively young, is increasingly intertwined with the traditional financial world. Understanding these macroeconomic signals, such as the jobs report , can provide valuable insights for navigating the crypto market. In conclusion, the February nonfarm payrolls data serves as a reminder of the dynamic interplay between traditional economics and the cryptocurrency market. While the miss in expectations might introduce short-term volatility, it also underscores the importance of staying informed, managing risk, and maintaining a long-term perspective in the exciting and ever-evolving world of crypto. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: Top Crypto Exchange Binance Launches Trading Support for Brand-New Multichain Oracle Altcoin
body: Binance, the largest crypto exchange by trading volume in the world, has rolled out trading support for a brand-new multichain oracle altcoin. Traders on the top global crypto exchange can now buy and sell RED , the native asset of the modular blockchain oracle RedStone. RedStone bills itself as “the fastest-growing blockchain oracle” with users on more than 80 chains. “In 2024 alone RedStone user base grew by over 500%, and Total Value Secured grew by over 6,000%. Powered by novel, sustainable tokenomics, RED will accrue REAL YIELD from RedStone data users. Staked RED will receive a portion of data consumer fees as RedStone scales to secure thousands of blockchains and trillions of dollars in on-chain finance.” Binance’s listing was postponed by three hours on Thursday “due to unexpected and last minute changes by RedStone (RED) to the allocation of their community airdrop distribution.” RED is trading at $0.68 at time of writing. The 278th-ranked crypto asset by market cap is down more than 27% on its first day of trading. Binance attached a seed tag to RED, a designation the exchange attaches to lower-liquidity projects that could exhibit higher volatility compared to other listed tokens. Binance requires users who want to trade assets with seed tags to pass quizzes every 90 days to ensure they’re aware of the risks. title: Fold’s Bold Move: Accumulates 475 Bitcoin, Vaulting into Top 10 Public BTC Holders
body: In a powerful display of conviction in digital gold, Bitcoin-focused financial services firm Fold Holdings has significantly ramped up its Bitcoin (BTC) reserves. The company, traded on NASDAQ as FLD, announced a substantial acquisition of 475 BTC, injecting nearly 50% growth into its treasury. This strategic accumulation, detailed by CoinDesk, propels Fold’s total Bitcoin holdings to an impressive 1,485 BTC. But what does this aggressive move signal for Fold and the broader landscape of cryptocurrency investment ? Let’s dive into the details. Fold’s Astonishing Increase in BTC Holdings: A Deep Dive Fold’s recent acquisition of 475 BTC is not just a minor top-up; it’s a significant leap that underscores the company’s commitment to Bitcoin as a core asset. This bold move positions Fold amongst the elite U.S. public companies boasting the largest BTC holdings . Here’s a breakdown of what we know: Strategic Acquisition: Fold secured the 475 BTC through a convertible note, indicating a calculated financial maneuver to bolster its Bitcoin treasury. Substantial Growth: This single purchase increased Fold’s Bitcoin reserves by nearly 50%, demonstrating a strong bullish stance on Bitcoin’s future. Top Tier Status: With 1,485 BTC, Fold firmly establishes itself within the top 10 U.S. public companies holding Bitcoin, joining the ranks of MicroStrategy and Tesla in their conviction towards digital assets. Bitcoin-Centric Strategy: As a Bitcoin-only financial services app, this move aligns perfectly with Fold’s core business model and reinforces its dedication to the Bitcoin ecosystem. This strategic accumulation begs the question: Why is Fold so aggressively increasing its Bitcoin reserves? Why the Bitcoin Buying Spree? Understanding Fold’s Strategy Several factors could be driving Fold’s decision to substantially increase its BTC holdings . Let’s explore some potential motivations: Long-Term Bitcoin Bullishness: Fold’s leadership likely holds a strong long-term belief in Bitcoin’s appreciation. Accumulating BTC now could be seen as a strategic investment to benefit from future price surges. Treasury Diversification: In an era of economic uncertainty and inflationary pressures, Bitcoin is increasingly viewed as a valuable treasury asset, offering diversification away from traditional fiat currencies. Attracting Bitcoin-Savvy Customers: For a Bitcoin-focused company like Fold, holding significant BTC reserves can enhance its credibility and appeal to its target audience of Bitcoin enthusiasts. It signals a deep alignment with the values and principles of the Bitcoin community. Potential Revenue Generation: Holding Bitcoin can also open up opportunities for yield generation through various Bitcoin-based financial products and services, further strengthening Fold’s financial position. But are there any challenges associated with such a significant cryptocurrency investment ? Navigating the Challenges of Large Bitcoin Treasuries While holding a substantial Bitcoin treasury offers numerous advantages, it’s not without its challenges. Companies like Fold must navigate: Volatility Management: Bitcoin’s price volatility is well-known. Managing risk associated with these price swings is crucial. Companies need robust treasury management strategies to mitigate potential downsides. Regulatory Landscape: The regulatory environment for cryptocurrencies is still evolving. Companies holding large BTC reserves must stay ahead of regulatory changes and ensure compliance. Security and Custody: Securely storing and managing a large Bitcoin treasury is paramount. Robust custody solutions and security protocols are essential to protect against theft or loss. Accounting and Reporting: Accounting for Bitcoin holdings can be complex. Companies need to adhere to evolving accounting standards and reporting requirements for digital assets. Despite these challenges, Fold’s commitment to expanding its institutional Bitcoin holdings indicates a strong belief that the rewards outweigh the risks. Fold’s Move in Context: The Broader Trend of Institutional Bitcoin Adoption Fold’s aggressive Bitcoin acquisition is not an isolated event. It’s part of a growing trend of institutional Bitcoin adoption. More and more public companies are recognizing Bitcoin’s potential as a store of value and a strategic asset. This trend is fueled by: Growing Mainstream Acceptance: Bitcoin is becoming increasingly accepted as a legitimate asset class by institutional investors and corporations. Inflation Hedge Narrative: Concerns about inflation are driving institutions to seek alternative assets like Bitcoin to preserve capital. Decentralization and Innovation: Bitcoin’s decentralized nature and its potential to disrupt traditional finance are attracting forward-thinking companies. Competitive Advantage: Early adoption of Bitcoin can provide companies with a competitive edge in the rapidly evolving digital economy. Fold’s decision to bolster its Bitcoin treasury is a powerful example of this trend in action. It sends a clear signal that Bitcoin is not just a speculative asset but a strategic component of corporate treasury management. Actionable Insights: What Does Fold’s Bitcoin Accumulation Mean for You? Fold’s strategic move provides valuable insights for both individuals and businesses interested in the cryptocurrency investment space: For Individuals: Fold’s action reinforces the long-term investment thesis for Bitcoin. It highlights the growing institutional confidence in Bitcoin’s future. If you’re considering Bitcoin, Fold’s move adds to the growing body of evidence supporting its potential. For Businesses: Fold’s example can inspire businesses to explore Bitcoin as a treasury asset. While careful consideration of risks and regulatory compliance is essential, the potential benefits of Bitcoin exposure are becoming increasingly apparent. For the Crypto Industry: Fold’s move is a positive signal for the entire cryptocurrency industry. It demonstrates the continued maturation and institutionalization of Bitcoin and digital assets. Conclusion: Fold’s Bitcoin Power Play Signals a Bright Future Fold Holdings’ substantial increase in its Bitcoin treasury is more than just a financial transaction; it’s a bold statement of belief in Bitcoin’s long-term value and potential. By aggressively expanding its BTC holdings , Fold is not only securing its own financial future but also contributing to the broader narrative of institutional Bitcoin adoption. This strategic accumulation underscores the growing importance of Bitcoin in the modern financial landscape and paves the way for further innovation and growth within the cryptocurrency ecosystem. To learn more about the latest Bitcoin trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin institutional adoption.

title: SHIB Price Surge Incoming? Agent Shiboshi’s Burn Feature Slashes Token Supply
body: The developers of Agent Shiboshi, a blockchain-based game built on the Shiba Inu network, have introduced a new 1v1 duel format, which could drive increased demand for SHIB. Agent Shiboshi: SHIB Burns & 1v1 Duels Are Here! Every duel burns SHIB, making every battle a win for the ecosystem! title: Crypto AI Token Hype: Finished or Far from Over? – Long-Term Price Forecast for FET, NEAR, and RENDER
body: The recent excitement around crypto AI tokens sparks a critical inquiry: is the hype dwindling or just beginning? A one-week slide of 6.86% adds to the downward pressure seen in recent performance. Past moves have shown consistent weakness with prices trending lower over these periods. Current price trades between $0.48 and $0.94 with immediate resistance at $1.22 and support near $0.31. Bears seem to hold sway as indicators like the RSI near 37.70 and slight negative momentum point to continued pressure. Trading strategies may focus on a potential bounce from support or waiting for signs of a reversal above the resistance level. The price has trended downward consistently, reflecting prolonged pressure despite minor fluctuations. Over the past week, a modest drop of 1.63% highlights ongoing weakness in price action. Historical movements demonstrate an overall lack of strength, suggesting caution among traders. title: A brief history of Ethereum’s relationship with ZK
body: This is a segment from the 0xResearch newsletter. To read full editions, subscribe . It all starts with Ethereum. The L1 is too slow. Every node needs to redundantly re-execute transactions in a block to ensure validity, which limits scalability. By 2020, the Ethereum community coalesced around rollups as the scaling solution. Vitalik’s 2021 landmark blog post on rollups explains how optimistic and zk rollups can scale Ethereum. Zk rollups are technologically superior for scaling but the tech was still too expensive to use and far behind (more later). So optimistic rollups broke into the market first. Optimistic rollups assume all transactions are valid until someone challenges it with a fraud proof within a seven-day challenge period. Optimistic rollups worked, but they came with hidden costs. The challenge period meant longer transaction finality before users could withdraw funds. Locked liquidity meant capital efficiencies and a generally poorer UX, especially with chain interoperability. Meanwhile, zk was catching up. At ETHCC 2022, Polygon, zkSync and Scroll all announced zkEVMs, which enable Solidity devs to write code and prove the execution of the EVM — effectively allowing Ethereum to leverage zero knowledge technology. By 2023, zk rollups started to gain real traction. Why exactly are zk proofs better than optimistic fraud proofs? Namely because zk proofs are much smaller (~1-10 KB) compared to raw transaction data (megabytes in size). By using zk cryptography to prove Ethereum transactions, these highly compressed proofs meant lower data availability costs and better scalability. How zero knowledge works in a nutshell Though zk was taking off, proof generation was still expensive. Based on zkstats.io, the average cost to generate a zk proof in December 2023 was $80.21. Fast forward to 2025. Proof costs have dropped to $1.3 per proof, about a 98.4% improvement. What changed? Today, each of the core pieces of the zk rollup stack have been broken up. Firstly, zkVMs are here . These specialized virtual machines speed up the zk development experience and make validity proof generation more efficient. Before zkVMs, developers needed to write complex, mathematical “circuits” to prove EVM execution. I believe RISC-V zkVMs will be the fastest technology to get commoditized. There won't be almost performance differences between the each implementation. One to two years max for this to happen. — Fede’s intern 🥊 (@fede_intern) October 24, 2024 ZkVMs like SP1, RISC Zero, Nexus and OpenVM today effectively democratize zk development for all developers (C++, Rust) without zk cryptographic expertise. In the past, zkEVMs only enabled Solidity development on zk rollups. Think of zkVMs as a more general concept than zkEVMs. Second, the costs to generate proofs are going down because of market competition. Today, there are many competitive marketplaces operated by Risc Zero, Cysic , Lagrange and Succinct. Some are still in testnet, some are operational. Zk L2s are also turning to proof aggregation techniques to amortize verification costs. The way this roughly works is by batching many proofs inside of one, which makes the final proof faster to verify. These marketplaces are also permissionless, meaning anyone with a GPU rig can sign up, post a bond and generate zk proofs. Previously, zk rollups used “centralized provers,” meaning they rented GPU/FPGA hardware from Google or Amazon. Better proof systems are also constantly launching. These proof systems (examples: Groth16, Halo2-KZG, STARK, Plonk, Expander) algorithmically define the rules as to how zk proofs are constructed and verified. They’re getting better, which means zk proofs are getting smaller and faster to verify. This in turn means increased zkVM performance gains. Finally, there are zk co-processors built on top of zkVMs. These things basically allow onchain apps that do not exist in a zk execution environment to leverage the wonders of zk technology. The way it does so is by moving computation offchain, therefore running asynchronous to the blockchain’s execution. This enables apps to compute complex statistics offchain, prove it with zk, then post that proof onchain. Apps like Frax, Azuki, Etherfi and Gearbox are using Lagrange’s zk co-processor to get around the limits of the Ethereum L1. So there you have it. That’s why zk is the endgame. title: Bitcoin Realized HODL Waves Signals Strong Market Confidence – Details
body: President Donald Trump signed an executive order on Thursday to establish a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve, according to a post on X by White House Crypto and AI czar David Sacks. The announcement was expected to boost market confidence, but instead, Bitcoin fell as the order details disappointed investors who had anticipated a more bullish stance from the administration. Bitcoin has been struggling around the $90,000 level, unable to reclaim it as support or confirm a recovery from the selling pressure that has dominated the market in recent weeks. Despite several attempts to push higher, BTC has remained in a volatile range, with uncertainty keeping traders cautious. Key on-chain data from CryptoQuant reveals that the Realized Cap HODL Waves chart shows a substantial portion of Bitcoin is currently concentrated in the 3–6 month holding range. This suggests that many investors who entered the market recently are still holding onto their coins, despite the volatility. With Bitcoin failing to break key resistance , traders are watching for a decisive move—either a breakout above $90K or a deeper correction. The next few days will be crucial in determining BTC’s short-term trajectory as uncertainty continues to dominate the market. Bitcoin Shows Signs Of Recovery Amid Volatility Bitcoin is struggling to reclaim the $90,000 mark but continues to hold firm above $85,000, a critical support level that could serve as a decisive point of inflection if bulls fail to defend it. With BTC trapped in a volatile range, a break below $85K could trigger a deeper correction, while a reclaim of $90K could signal renewed strength and a push toward higher levels. The decline in cryptocurrencies closely mirrors the downtrend in U.S. stock markets as investors react to fears of a widening global trade war and broader economic instability. However, this turbulence could fade if upcoming policy decisions—such as tax cuts, regulatory clarity, and institutional incentives—provide tangible benefits for investors. If confidence returns, Bitcoin could stage a strong recovery and move toward new all-time highs. Top analyst Axel Adler shared insights on X , pointing to on-chain data from the Realized Cap HODL Waves chart, which reveals that a significant portion of Bitcoin is currently concentrated in the 3–6 month holding range. Adler notes that historically, the longer coins remain “locked in” by investors, the stronger market confidence becomes. This suggests that many recent buyers are holding firm despite volatility, reinforcing the notion that Bitcoin’s long-term outlook remains strong. With market sentiment still mixed, traders are watching whether BTC can hold $85K and push higher or risk another leg down. The next few days will be crucial in determining whether Bitcoin can reclaim key resistance levels or if further downside awaits. BTC Bulls Face A Critical Test Bitcoin is currently trading at $89,000, facing persistent selling pressure as bulls struggle to regain control of key levels. Despite multiple attempts to push higher, BTC remains uncertain, unable to confirm a move into higher supply zones or a deeper drop into lower demand levels. For bulls to reclaim momentum, Bitcoin must break above $90,000 with strength and quickly aim for a move toward $100,000. A decisive reclaim of these levels would signal renewed buying interest and trigger a strong rally. However, BTC remains at risk of continued sideways action or another sell-off without a clear breakout. If Bitcoin fails to reclaim $90K and loses support at $85K, the market could see another leg down, with $78,000 emerging as the next key target. This would indicate increased selling pressure and potential panic selling, forcing BTC into a deeper correction. For now, uncertainty continues to dominate, leaving traders watching whether BTC will hold above $85K or break higher. The coming days will be crucial in determining whether Bitcoin reclaims strength or faces another wave of downside pressure. Featured image from Dall-E, chart from TradingView

title: Yescoin founder Zhang Chi detained amid business dispute in China
body: ​Zhang Chi, also known as Zoroo, the founder of Yescoin — a mini-game project within the Telegram Open Network ecosystem — was detained by Shanghai police. This detention followed a business dispute with his partner, identified as Wang Mouxin or ‘OldWang.’ The disagreement, initially a civil matter, has escalated into a criminal case, raising concerns within the Yescoin community. ​ Yescoin, operating within the TON ( TON ) ecosystem, tries to integrate blockchain technology with gaming, offering users a decentralized platform for mini-games. The project has garnered attention for its innovative approach to combining gaming with blockchain, attracting a diverse user base interested in both sectors.​ The internal dispute between Zhang Chi and his partner Wang has cast a shadow over the project’s future. pic.twitter.com/gRbVHUmxEz — Yescoin (@Yescoin_Fam) March 7, 2025 The Yescoin team addressed the situation on their official X account, stating: “What began as a business agreement between partners has now escalated into a criminal case.” They expressed regret over the incident, acknowledging its potential to undermine community consensus and peace, and conveyed their sadness over the disruption caused. ​ Despite Zhang’s detention, the Yescoin team has assured users that the platform continues to operate normally. They remain committed to maintaining platform stability and upholding community trust. You might also like: Binance to democratize crypto listings and delistings

title: Solana Foundation Exec Criticizes SIMD-228 as ‘Half-Baked,’ Anatoly Yakovenko Disagrees
body: Solana Foundation Executive Director Lily Liu has raised concerns over SIMD-228, a proposal to adjust the emissions of the network’s native SOL token based on staking participation, calling it “too half-baked.” However, Solana co-founder Anatoly Yakovenko holds a different view, standing by the plan despite their disagreement. Liu Criticizes SIMD-228 In a lengthy thread on X, Liu argued that the proposal could negatively impact SOL at a crucial stage of its development. She stressed that the blockchain and its assets are deeply interconnected, and changes to its economics must consider the broader implications. According to her, for a major economic policy, network engineers rather than asset managers have dominated discussions, leading to an imbalanced perspective. She further defended Solana’s fixed-rate yields, which SIMD-228 is looking to change, arguing that it provides predictability, a key factor for institutional investors. “Fixed rates are not “dumb and arbitrary”; they’re predictable,” Liu wrote. “In capital markets, predictability is valuable,” she added, citing the success of Solana’s staked exchange-traded products (ETPs) in Europe as proof of the importance of stability. Dynamic pricing, a feature of the new proposal, might optimize network security, but in Liu’s opinion, this could come at the cost of destabilizing the value of SOL. She warned that changing the asset’s characteristics could reduce buy-and-hold pressure, undermining its growth. The executive also highlighted Solana’s trajectory, fueled by its staking ecosystem. “Big Beautiful Yield is also an ecosystem growth budget,” she noted, stating it had enabled unique crypto-native products like Payfi. Additionally, she shared her concern that given that SIMD-228 originated from venture capital proposals, its adoption could ignite worries about Solana being controlled by a select few after it only recently shook off criticisms of centralization. Yakovenko’s Response However, not everyone agrees with Liu’s position. Yakovenko expressed support for her but differed with her stance on the proposal: “Lily is awesome and has my full support and confidence even though I disagree with her on this issue.” “Steel sharpens steel,” the Solana co-founder added, affirming the importance of healthy debate. Meanwhile, Chris Burniske, a partner at VC firm Placeholder, has argued that SIMD-228 is a necessary step toward a more mature economic model for Solana. “I’m in favor of SIMD-228. In the long run, real yield comes from what the demand-side leaks to the supply-side, and inflation is just a bootstrapping mechanism to get to that place,” he stated. At the time of writing, SOL is down just over 3% in the last 24 hours. The token is one of the major digital assets name-dropped to be part of a U.S. strategic digital asset stockpile. An announcement on Thursday by White House crypto advisor David Sacks that President Donald Trump had signed an executive order creating the stockpile caused the market to tank , losing at least $200 million. The post Solana Foundation Exec Criticizes SIMD-228 as ‘Half-Baked,’ Anatoly Yakovenko Disagrees appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Revolutionary 24/7 Trading: Nasdaq to Embrace Crypto with Bitcoin ETFs
body: Exciting news for crypto enthusiasts and investors! Nasdaq, a leading global exchange, is poised to make a groundbreaking move by introducing 24-hour trading. This significant development, announced on X, signals a major shift in how markets operate and could have profound implications, especially for the burgeoning crypto market and the popular Bitcoin ETFs listed on the exchange. Let’s dive into what this means for you and the future of trading. What’s the Buzz About Nasdaq’s 24/7 Trading? Nasdaq, the second-largest stock exchange in the United States, has officially declared its intention to launch 24-hour trading on the Nasdaq Stock Market. This is not just a minor tweak; it’s a fundamental change in market operations. Currently, traditional stock exchanges operate during standard business hours, typically from 9:30 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. ET. Moving to a 24/7 model means that trading will be possible around the clock, every day of the week. This announcement has sent ripples through the financial world, particularly within the crypto market , given Nasdaq’s involvement with Bitcoin ETFs . For context, several spot Bitcoin ETFs are already listed on Nasdaq, including industry giants like BlackRock’s IBIT, Bitwise’s BITB, and Valkyrie’s BRRR. The presence of these crypto-based investment products on a major exchange like Nasdaq already signified a growing acceptance of digital assets within mainstream finance. Now, with the introduction of 24/7 trading , Nasdaq is taking another giant leap, potentially bridging the gap between traditional stock markets and the always-on nature of the crypto market . Why Embrace 24/7 Trading? The Benefits Unveiled The decision to move to 24/7 trading is not arbitrary. It’s driven by several compelling factors, each aimed at enhancing market efficiency and investor access. Let’s explore the key benefits: Increased Accessibility for Global Investors: Traditional market hours are geographically restrictive. Investors in Asia or Europe, for instance, often have to trade outside of their local business hours to participate in the U.S. markets. 24/7 trading eliminates this barrier, allowing investors from any time zone to trade at their convenience. This democratization of access is a significant advantage, especially in the increasingly globalized financial landscape. Responsiveness to Global News and Events: In today’s interconnected world, news breaks around the clock. Market-moving events can happen at any time, whether it’s an economic announcement from Asia in the middle of the U.S. night or a geopolitical event unfolding during European trading hours. With 24/7 trading , markets can react to these events in real-time, ensuring prices reflect the most current information. This reduces the risk of overnight gaps and allows for more efficient price discovery. Catering to the Crypto Generation: The crypto market never sleeps. It operates 24/7, 365 days a year. This always-on nature is a core characteristic of digital assets and is something crypto investors are accustomed to. By introducing 24/7 trading , Nasdaq is aligning itself with the operational norms of the crypto market , potentially attracting more crypto-savvy investors to its platform and making it a more appealing venue for listing crypto-related products. Enhanced Liquidity and Tighter Spreads: Extended trading hours can contribute to increased trading volume over time, potentially leading to greater liquidity. Higher liquidity typically translates to tighter bid-ask spreads, making trading more cost-effective for investors. While liquidity might be thinner during off-peak hours initially, as adoption grows, 24/7 trading could foster a more liquid and efficient market environment. Competitive Edge: In the fiercely competitive world of exchanges, innovation is key to attracting listings and trading volume. By pioneering 24/7 trading , Nasdaq is positioning itself as a forward-thinking exchange that is responsive to the evolving needs of the market and its participants. This move could give Nasdaq a competitive edge over exchanges that adhere to traditional trading hours. Navigating the Challenges: What are the Potential Hurdles? While the benefits of 24/7 trading are compelling, implementing such a significant change is not without its challenges. It’s crucial to consider the potential hurdles Nasdaq and market participants might face: Liquidity Fragmentation: Initially, liquidity might be fragmented across the 24-hour trading day. Trading volume is likely to be concentrated during traditional market hours, with potentially thinner volumes during overnight and weekend sessions. Ensuring sufficient liquidity across all hours will be critical for the success of 24/7 trading . Market makers and liquidity providers will need to adapt their strategies to provide continuous liquidity. Operational and Technological Demands: Running a stock market 24/7 requires robust operational and technological infrastructure. Exchanges and brokerage firms will need to ensure their systems can handle continuous trading, clearing, and settlement processes without interruption. This necessitates significant investment in technology and operational support to maintain system stability and security around the clock. Regulatory and Compliance Considerations: Extending trading hours may raise new regulatory and compliance questions. Regulators will need to adapt their oversight frameworks to ensure market integrity and investor protection in a 24/7 trading environment. Issues such as market surveillance, order routing, and best execution will need to be addressed in the context of round-the-clock operations. Staffing and Human Resources: Operating 24/7 requires significant staffing adjustments. Exchanges, brokerage firms, and other market participants will need to implement shift work and ensure adequate staffing levels to support continuous operations. This can lead to increased operational costs and require careful human resource management. Investor Readiness and Education: Investors, particularly retail investors, will need to adapt to the concept of 24/7 trading . Education will be crucial to ensure investors understand the implications of trading outside of traditional hours, including potential liquidity differences and the need for continuous monitoring of their positions. Brokerage platforms will need to provide tools and resources to help investors navigate the 24/7 trading environment effectively. Bitcoin ETFs and 24/7 Nasdaq: A Powerful Synergy? The introduction of 24/7 trading by Nasdaq is particularly noteworthy given the presence of spot Bitcoin ETFs on its platform. These ETFs, including BlackRock’s IBIT, Bitwise’s BITB, and Valkyrie’s BRRR, provide traditional investors with exposure to Bitcoin within a regulated and familiar investment vehicle. The move to 24/7 trading could amplify the appeal and accessibility of these Bitcoin ETFs in several ways: Enhanced Trading Flexibility for Bitcoin ETF Investors: Currently, trading of Bitcoin ETFs on Nasdaq is limited to standard market hours. With 24/7 trading , investors will have the flexibility to trade these ETFs at any time, aligning with the always-on nature of the underlying Bitcoin market. This is particularly beneficial for investors who want to react to crypto market movements that occur outside of traditional stock market hours. Bridging Traditional Finance and Crypto: 24/7 trading on Nasdaq can further bridge the gap between traditional finance and the crypto market . By adopting a 24/7 operational model, Nasdaq is signaling its commitment to accommodating the needs of the crypto market and its investors. This could encourage further integration of digital assets into mainstream financial markets. Potential for Increased Trading Volume in Bitcoin ETFs: The increased accessibility and trading hours could lead to higher trading volumes in Bitcoin ETFs listed on Nasdaq. Investors who were previously constrained by traditional market hours may now be able to trade more actively, potentially boosting liquidity and market depth for these products. What Does This Mean for You? Actionable Insights Nasdaq’s move towards 24/7 trading is a significant development with implications for various market participants. Here are some actionable insights to consider: For Crypto Investors: If you are already active in the crypto market , Nasdaq’s 24/7 trading could make Bitcoin ETFs an even more attractive option. You will have the flexibility to trade these ETFs around the clock, similar to trading Bitcoin directly. Keep an eye on how liquidity develops during off-peak hours and adjust your trading strategies accordingly. For Traditional Stock Market Investors: 24/7 trading on Nasdaq could present new opportunities and challenges. Be prepared to monitor market developments outside of traditional hours and consider how global news events might impact your portfolio overnight. Evaluate if extended trading hours align with your investment strategy and risk tolerance. For Traders: 24/7 trading can create more trading opportunities but also demands increased vigilance. Consider the potential for lower liquidity during certain hours and manage your risk accordingly. Develop trading strategies that are suitable for both peak and off-peak trading sessions. For Financial Institutions: Brokerage firms, market makers, and exchanges need to prepare their infrastructure and operations for 24/7 trading . Invest in technology, staffing, and risk management systems to support continuous operations and ensure seamless service for clients. Stay informed about regulatory developments related to extended trading hours. Conclusion: A New Era of Market Accessibility Nasdaq’s plan to introduce 24/7 trading is a revolutionary step that could reshape the landscape of stock markets and further integrate traditional finance with the dynamic world of crypto. By breaking the constraints of traditional trading hours, Nasdaq is paving the way for increased global accessibility, enhanced responsiveness to market events, and a more seamless experience for investors, particularly those interested in Bitcoin ETFs and the crypto market . While challenges remain, the potential benefits of 24/7 trading are undeniable, signaling a bold move towards a truly always-on global marketplace. This development is one to watch closely as it unfolds and potentially sets a new standard for exchanges worldwide. To learn more about the latest explore our article on key developments shaping crypto market trends.
